Name: War Of Gold 2 Mission 99
About the game: Story: War of gold game sequel Third person war themed shooter game. Gold are again stolen from Evil army from East and your mission is to kill enemy army soldiers. Enemy soldiers are heavy equipped with rifle and other different weapons. Stolen gold are hidden somewhere at level and you need find it. There is 10 different locations like forest, city, facility factory etc. Player need use different weapons like rifle, pistol and also grenades to survive. Also need collect more ammos at different levels. After player dies he need start level from start point Features: - 10 different themed maps - Several weapons like pistol and rifle - Grenades to throw, several different grenades - Collect ammo pick ups and more grenades - Enemy soldiers - Explosive barrels - Inventory - Looting. Player can collect ammos and grenades from death soldiers - Steam achievements Planned updates: - More maps

Name: Merge Beasts - Defense Game
About the game: The evil Beasts are attacking our temple, and we need your help! Merge the Beasts by dragging them on top of each other to build up your defenses. Fight off waves of evil Beasts and take down bosses to unlock new levels. You need to become a real strategy master to pass various levels for defending your Temple. Each level contains a set of challenging tasks. Only completing all the tasks advances your progress and levels you up. Merge Beasts to get more powerful Beasts ‚Äì a single Beasts won‚Äôt save you! A simple game with an addictive merge core you can spend hours playing every day. Slide and merge Beasts of the same type to discover new Beasts! Features: - High-Quality Graphics - Endless Gameplay - Multiple Beasts to unlock and upgrade - Boss Waves

Name: Orkhon Inscriptions Mongolia VR
About the game: Orkhon Inscriptions Turkish writings, discovered in the valley of the Orkhon River in northern Mongolia in 1889. They are deciphered in 1893 by the Danish Philologist Vilhem Thomsen. They are on three large monuments, erected in AD 732 and 735 in honour of the turkish prince K√ºl (d. 731), his brother the emperor Bilge (d. 734) and Tonyukuk (d. 716) the councelor of four Turkic khagans. They relate in epic language the legendary origins of the Turks, the golden age of their history. The polished style of the writings suggests considerable earlier development of the Turkish language. This VR animated experience aimes to give an impression of these monuments. The content is much longer than shown here. Erkan Erat (M.A. Study of Central Asia, Turkology and Cultural Anthropology).

Name: Bounty
About the game: Mask up! On an odd, devastated world lives a strange race of humanoid blobs. Though most living things are extinct, blob-kind clings to life through a network of air-tight buildings connected by sprawling networks of underground tunnels. As one of the few blobs with the courage to explore the dusty remains of your city, you profit from sifting through the wreckage of the past - but tread lightly! Where there's opportunity, there's competition. Movement is the Key to Your Survival!l Engage in fast-paced and brutal combat that will put your reflexes to the test. Swap between weapons and chug consumable items on the fly to get an edge on your opponents. Unleash Carnage! Wreak havoc on your enemies to generate Carnage, then unleash it to trigger devastating special attacks! Weapons! Your weapons are specialized tools of destruction; each one has its own unique special ability. Dual wield weapons to chain together devastating strikes, or wield a single weapon to unleash Carnage with style. Explore a dangerous and unpredictable world! New discoveries and challenges lurk around every corner. With great danger comes great rewards! Defeat enemies to earn powerful randomized loot drops that will let you customize every aspect of your character. Make friends along the way! Recruit companions to help you in combat, or simply to keep you company. It's a lonely, dusty world out there.

Name: Metal Miners
About the game: Metal Miners is a chaotic, resource gathering, party game set in a cave full of rich resources. In this 2-4 player, split-screen, action-driven game inspired by cult classic Kirby Air Ride, players are tasked with crafting the glorious Golden Crown to please a greedy king! Different Game Modes Metal Miners currently features 2 game modes: Golden Crown mode and Score Based mode. Crown mode is Metal Miners' unique mode which tasks each player to collect all the resources required to craft the Golden Crown! Score Based mode is a traditional round-based game mode where players must gather as many resources as possible to win the game. Unique Abilities To get an edge against your friends, you may choose an ability at the start of each game. These abilities range from Invisibility to a Dodge. You can get the drop on your enemies by putting these abilities to good use. You could even escape death by vanishing and running away! If trickery is your specialty, perhaps lay a tripwire to explode your friends! Item Tiers Metal Miners features 4 different resource tiers! The tiers of items are as follows (least rare -> rarest): Copper Iron Titanium Diamond To progress in the game, players will need to craft pickaxes in order to advance to the next tier. If a player wants a Diamond, simply craft the Titanium Pickaxe! Crafting System While in between rounds, players may spend their resources that they have gathered and refined to craft 14 different amazing items. Some items are able to be crafted multiple times, while others are a permanent upgrade. The players will have to choose which items benefit their game the most! Multiple Maps Explore and Fight in several unique maps made to create tension and chaos among friends! Each map features a unique look and feel. More maps will be coming soon! Customizability Change the length of the game and the length between crafting rounds! More customizability is to come!

Name: Snowman Adventure
About the game: Snowman Adventure is a third-person platformer. In this cool game you play as John the snowman. You have to get through all the obstacles to complete this game. This game will give you unforgettable emotions of joy and fun. Play it with cheerful and perky music! Would you like to feel like a snowman? If yes, then do not pass by this game. Plunge into the world of fun! Play this third person adventure game! Get real pleasure, passing incredibly difficult and truly dangerous tests. It will be incredibly Lego to die in this game, but it will not be easy to win and reach the end !!! Enjoy playing this game with funny music that will definitely not let you get bored! Features of the game: Fun music and cool atmosphere! Catchy, intuitive gameplay! Incredibly cool levels! Very beautiful graphics! Great music!

Name: Zombie Mansion
About the game: Zombie Mansion is a 2D side-scrolling platform shooter with puzzle and exploration elements. You woke up in a mansion full of animated corpses, you have to find a way out. The mansion consists of many floors of corridors and rooms, in order to get out you need to find keys and solve simple riddles. Find new weapons, ammunition and first aid kits. The deeper into the mansion, the more and stronger the zombies and the more intricate locations. 15 levels 4 types of zombies 3 weapons 4 types of keys and doors

Name: KFZ
About the game: KFZ is a Zombie wave based shooter featuring 9 levels and plenty of Gore Everything From Small to Large Maps Survive 9 levels of endless zombie waves Countless different types of weapons everything from small guns to large semi-automatic machine guns Also laser guns, ray guns, glamor guns everything to survive do you have it in you.... With this purchase of KFZ includes nine levels several different gun types and Endless fun for everyone

Name: The Dead Prince
About the game: The Dead Prince is a turn based stealth puzzle game where you play a blood magic assassin fulfilling the pact his family made long ago. The Sultan‚Äôs enemies are closing in, use your assortment of magical abilities to sneak through bases, take down guards, and assassinate your target. Use an assortment of powers Harness mana and blood based abilities to overcome obstacles and carve your own path through each scenario. Your choices of which abilities to use will have an effect on what resources you have available in subsequent challenges. Sneak through bases The multiple paths, collectables, and challenges bring replayability and the power to choose your own path. Choose your own path Feature List 66+ stealth puzzles with multiple solutions. 8 unique powers Different enemy types with distinct dangers Beautiful pixel art visuals

Name: Might of the Stones
About the game: The world is in danger. An evil entity is trying to destroy the world. It is your job to stop this evil being! Do you have what is takes to save the planet? Start your journey from your hometown Appleby. An evil entity is trying to destroy the world. You and your team are going to investigate who or what is trying to destroy the planet. You have to gather all the gems spread over the world to stop this entity. During your journey you will come across dozens of monsters, many different people, a lot of adventures and ofcourse the Stones. You can progress throughout the game and earn xp to level up your character. Fight however you want. Do want to use Magic? Go ahead. Do you prefer to fight with your sword? Go ahead. Or don't you like the fighting part? Just retreat from battle. Beware, you can not retreat from every battle. This Game Is Made Entirely With Rpg Maker Mv. Features A 2D Adventure/Story RPG Find all the Gems needed to save the world Sidequests whenever you don't feel like doing the main story Discover hidden places and unluck various items Control multiple characters Ton's of enemies to fight Minigames (Bosses/Maze)

Name: PieceWars
About the game: Make full use of the unique skills of each piece to win! 'Piece Wars' is a chess-based board game. Here's how to play Piece Wars. ¬∑Formation Arrange the pieces to build a formation. ¬∑Shop Purchase pieces as needed. ¬∑Battle In the current version, you can play against enemy AI through story mode. In the online battle mode scheduled to be released in the future. You can enjoy casual matche and ranked match.

Name: Heat and Run
About the game: Choose a hero/heroine and equip them with a potent relic. Master your special skills and the block's creation during intense 4v4 battles. Use your Glocktail and Dynameats to destroy your opponent's Flame! Dominate with your team by creating effective strategies. Create synergies with your heroes, organize your defense and coordinate your assaults! Discover a frantic 4vs4 gameplay: - 8 Heroes and Heroines. - 3 Relics to boost your Hero. - 2 Maps: Overgrown & Akona. - Classic and custom modes. - Customizable in-game controls. - Audio communication with the voices of the Heroes. - Bots filling empty games. - Friends and Teams system, instant messaging. - Individual leaderboard. We are already preparing updates for Early Access and Release 1.0: - Resolution of reported bugs, server stability. - More Heroes, Relics and Maps. - A Tutorial in three didactic phases. - New modes: spectator and ranked. - Win XP and Gold to advance in the game. - Cosmetics to be the most classy on the battlefield. Discover our roadmap at the top of the steam page and join our discord to help us develop Heat and Run: Share your opinions and bugs! If you are interested in the game, don‚Äôt forget to add it to your wishlist! ‚ô• /

Name: NTR Dream
About the game: NTR Dream features a steamy story about an affair going too far. With animated sex scenes and voice covers for them, this short visual novel will grant you the best experience! Want to make it more special? You can name all characters in the game and watch as the play unfolds with your personal touch! Key Features Animated and fully uncensored scenes featuring great art and filled with steamy sex and spicy details. Great sounds, from the hot moaning to the environmental ambiance. Name all characters to make this story your personal play! An in-game gallery that allows both replaying unlocked scenes and just watching CGs from them. Quality of life features like hiding all interface elements with a simple button click.

Name: Byte Lynx
About the game: Byte Lynx is a fast-paced RTS with no units! Build defenses, then dismantle your enemy and steal their buildings! Byte Lynx centers around tactical combat between networks as you battle across a mysterious mechanical planet. Crush your enemies Design massive war platforms to demolish entrenched enemies. Build up your base or take theirs Build a sprawling base that extends to dominate the local resources and crush your enemies, or find the flaws in your enemy's defenses and steal their hard work. Face the unknown Unlock powerful new constructions and upgrade existing ones. You'll need them to face what lies ahead. You and the aggressively helpful AI, Byte, will have to battle through all kinds of dangers and face enemies with strange powers if you want to find out what's happening on this mysterious planet and find a way back home. Gameplay Features 20 Mission campaign 3 Difficulty levels 8 Versatile constructions ‚àû Assault platform configurations About the developers Artful Games is a two-person studio aiming to create innovative gameplay experiences. Byte Lynx, our first title, features unique construction-based combat. Byte Lynx is a spiritual successor to a DigiPen student game. You can check out our press kit here

Name: Power Ball 2022
About the game: Overview Power Ball 2022 continues the excitement of its predecessor but with newer graphics and a polished space environmental back drop. You will take on 50 levels of increasing difficulty to try to amass the points needed to reach the top of the leader board in this modern retro take of the classic bat / ball and brick breaking genre. Keep your eye on the main ball and save it from destruction as you traverse space portals and collect powerups to help you clear the stage of alien blocks. Features * 50 levels * Multiple power ups * Crazy physics based gameplay * Obstacles to either avoid or utilize * Steam leader board for Global High Scores * Steam leader boards for Level High Scores * Save/Load function * Steam Achievements * In game Global Rank Notifications

Name: Balkadia
About the game: Balkadia features classic platforming, dismemberment combat and giant bosses with multiple forms. This is not a metroidvania, it is a 'classicvania' inspired by Super Castlevania IV. In Balkadia your only weapon is the whip. It cuts through enemies like butter, uses them as throwable objects, can act as a shield and can shoot projectiles. Balkadia doesn‚Äôt have bottomless pits or one-hit death spikes, but will still test your platforming skills. Fluid jump controls, crouch movement and sprinting mechanics will help you overcome the challenge. In Balkadia you will stumble across many Slavic symbols and face off against famous monsters from Slavic mythology, including Leshy and Baba Yaga. An evil cult has kidnapped your son and intends to use him as a sacrifice to summon the most powerful Slavic creature in the world. You can speedrun the game in about 90 minutes, but it‚Äôs highly unlikely on your first play. There are 15 stages, each different in theme and design, and upgrades can be unlocked to help you with the finale. They can also be used to blast through previous stages for a bit fun, so there is replay value as well. Balkadia can work with any controller recognized by your operating system, but the keyboard is required during the initial configuration, hence why it states 'partial support' on the page. The menu contains a traditional configuration screen where individual inputs can be changed. Direct input is also supported. Every graphical asset in Balkadia is made with 4K in mind and is then scaled down for lower resolutions. The game also supports aspect ratios up to 32:9, so your ultrawide monitor will always be filled up. If you‚Äôre a retro gamer with a 5:4 monitor or an old-school 4:3 tube TV, you‚Äôll be pleased to know that Balkadia is not locked to widescreen. At a really low retro resolution like 640x480, Balkadia will play mostly fine even on a single core CPU with 2GB of ram, but a dual-core is recommended to achieve stable 60fps ( Intel Core 2 Duo/AMD Athlon 64 X2 ). No, Balkadia has V-Sync permanently enabled and runs at the refresh rate of your operating system. If you have a 144hz display, but the game is playing at 60fps, you will need to exit Balkadia, change to 144hz in your OS settings and relaunch the game. Balkadia‚Äôs demo includes the first 3 stages. It‚Äôs best to just play it and see if you‚Äôre having fun. However, as the sole developer of the game, I can share some details so you can make an informed decision. Balkadia is an ambitious passion project, but not perfect. The gameplay is mainly inspired by ‚ÄúSuper Castlevania IV‚Äù, the only Castlevania with 8-directional whipping. My goal was to bring this mechanic back and expand upon it. I am confident to say that this goal has been achieved. If you are a fan of SCV4, then Balkadia is for you. However, during testing, it has become clear that players unfamiliar with SCV4 have a hard time with the 8 directional whip - an essential part of 'supervania'. Balkadia is not as difficult as retro games of old, but still presents a challenge. If you take advantage of its controls, Balkadia becomes easier than SCV4. If you are uncertain, definitely try out the demo first, and bear in mind that if you don‚Äôt use the 8-directional whip, you won't fare well. In fact, this can make Balkadia feel more difficult than one of the hardest Vania games ‚Äì CV3. Hopefully this helps you make an informed decision.

Name: Gravity Chase
About the game: Welcome to the futuristic anti-gravity arcade racer with a twist. Gravity Chase racing competition takes place on tunnel tracks for super-fast 360 degree Zero G racing. Skill and precision piloting are required to follow the optimum line along with strategic use of pickups, powerups and weapons in order to progress through the race series. Features Anti gravity racing with a twist - Race along the floor, walls and ceiling to achieve the optimum racing line. 10 unique ships with customizable colors and powerups. 16 unique tracks across multiple themed environments. 1 - 4 player split screen action. Boost, repair and arm your ship with in-race pickups. 3 exciting race types - Arcade, Combat and Eliminator. In game currency - Win races to earn money that can be used to customize and upgrade your ships.

Name: Relic Adventure
About the game: There are a lot of treasures in the deepest of the relic, but only adventurers with wisdom and courage have the opportunity to approach them. You will push the rocks, activate devices and teleport circles to create the way to the next stage, overcome the poisonous spores, flames and water, travel through different terrains, layer by layer towards the treasure. The gameplay is simple and not having much stages, but they are difficult. Only recommended to people who are smart, with good logical, love or are good at solving puzzles. It is said that more than half of the adventurers are given up before they can pass even the 7th level... Are you better than them? The game contains: *10+ kinds of devices, monsters or traps * 3 chapters with different terrains *25 levels *2.5 ~ 25 hrs game time #Simple operation #Lots of extremely difficult puzzles #Not too many tips

Name: A Crown of Sorcery and Steel
About the game: Swing a sword, delve dungeons, and lead a resistance against the tyrannical queen of a war-torn fantasy realm. Will you be an elf, orc, dwarf, or human? ‚ÄúCrown of Sorcery and Steel‚Äù is a 300-thousand word interactive novel by Josh Labelle. It‚Äôs entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects, and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination. For centuries, the kingdom of Kanda has been at war with Queen Nidana and her infernal machines. Each day, further reaches of the kingdom fall under her boot, overwhelmed by her enchanted army of iron constructs. You‚Äôre an adventurer, caught in the middle of a war that began before you were born. Perhaps you‚Äôre an elf from the Sanctuaries to the west... which the queen‚Äôs machines long ago burned to the ground. Maybe you come from Ridgebank, one of the last human strongholds. Wherever you‚Äôre from, now you make your living helping people, plundering dungeons, or following the coin wherever it leads you. It‚Äôs not long before you‚Äôre invited to join the resistance and battle back against the dark empress. But will you rally the resistance... or ally with the queen and snuff it Out? Play as male, female, nonbinary; gay, straight, bi, asexual, or poly. Or choose among the genders of the elven, dwarven, and orc cultures. Wield a sword, master magic, or disarm traps as you travel Kanda, a teeming fantasy kingdom struggling against a brutal occupation. Engage in epic fantasy combat and turn the tide of the war as you battle side by side with a party full of fighters, spellslingers, and rogues. Explore the realm as a human, elf, dwarf, or orc, with four distinct backgrounds that change your adventure. Broker peace between the human cities and the dwarven mining colonies or side with the dwarves and take control of the mountains. Delve lost ruins to uncover ancient elven artifacts, and restore the elves to their former glory... or sell the artifacts off to the highest bidders. Navigate palace intrigue in the orc empire, and decide who should take the throne. Turn against the resistance and become the queen's best-loved spy to experience another side of the story. Romance a human resistance leader, an elven Scribe, a dwarven bard, an exiled orc prince, a halfling thief... or the dark queen herself. Will you unite the realm and end the queen‚Äôs reign of terror... or join her and rule by her side?

Name: Forest Mystery
About the game: Explore the exciting world of Forest Mystery. Go on an exploration spree and walk through the unique levels littered with fun and mind boggling quests and puzzles. On your adventure you will meet different NPC's who will help you to progress. . Forest Mystery is a new take to the walking simulator genre! Walk around and explore the village to meet the main guy, Winston. Winston will give you exciting quests to complete and be rewarded by! Find different items through the game to use on many different things. Gameplay is made simple so you will be able to pick it up in a few minutes of playing! Game lenght depends on the player but estimated to be around 30 minutes. The game does not include a saving system, so be ready to play in one sitting!

Name: TRAHA Global
About the game: Traha Global is RvR MMORPG based on the confrontation between two major factions. - An open world on a massive scale. Experience the vast open world with the highest quality graphics using the Unreal 4 Engine. Based on the launch version, there are 6 large open fields with an actual size of 3 to 5KM - Massive Battle based on RvR Led by the two major factions, Naiad and Vulcan, which have been in conflict for a long time, players must compete with their opponents on battlegrounds by cooperating with their teammates. - Infinity Class System The seven available classes are the Scythe, Bow, Greatsword, Shield, Staff, Dual Blade, and Knuckles. You can switch classes anytime and anywhere. In addition, combining the effects of attack, defense, or support skill tree attributes with a variety of active skills allows you to act as a tank, damage dealer, or healer. You can activate additional skill effects through triggers such as charging, holding, or timing skills to maximize your character‚Äôs power. Whether in the open field, dungeons, or in PvP/RvR instances, players will be tested on their understanding of their classes and skills through combat with their opponents. - Raids and Dungeons to Explore Raid dungeons featuring powerful monsters test the cooperation and strategy of players. Players should analyze the mechanics of boss monsters and come up with strategies accordingly. If you succeed in defeating the boss monster, high-level rewards will be waiting for you! - Variety of PvP/RvR content You can show off your individual battle skills in the 1v1 arena, Battlefield, Conquest Battles, Sieges, and Territorial Battles, where large-scale wars take place. These will test the power and unity of the players in their factions. Above all, Conquest Battles, which are held on a scale of 100 vs 100 and give buff rewards only to the winning side, are a showdown that must be won not only for the rewards, but for the pride of the faction. - Crafting Items with various Professions You can craft items and cook foods with ingredients you get from using professions like Gathering, Fishing, etc. Crafted items will provide helpful enhancements and buffs to the Traha and are essential in PvE/PvP/RvR battles.

Name: Space
About the game: Space is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will be told the story of two lesbians who are absolutely alone on a spaceship. Because of this, they fall in love with each other... The game is filled with scenes of sex, humor and romance. In this incredibly interesting game you will plunge into the story of two hot lesbians who are on a spaceship. Viola and Gwen are working on a spaceship and they are performing a very important mission for the planet. They are there just the two of them. Being in a difficult situation, they fall in love with each other. What happened next you will see in the game. Get real enjoyment from very simple gameplay and cool music. Beautiful graphics! Relaxing music! Exciting sex scenes!

Name: Space Assistance
About the game: You can't wander into space into someone else's territory. And now you are trapped. You will have to fight off the spaceships. Do not rely on luck, only your dexterity and ingenuity are your best friends. Space Assistance - Top Down Shooter, in this game you have to fight off the attacks of spaceships. Repel all their attacks and land on your planet, but there you will find a surprise. The pursuers will not leave you behind, deal with them. Game Features: - Pleasant musical accompaniment -Pixel Art - Excellent control - Difficulty

Name: Splinters of Regret
About the game: Splinters of Regret is a student-made action game with a focus on bullet hell elements and an atmospheric aesthetic. After committing multiple sins in life, you are forced to face them in death. A mountainous prison made of your own regrets seeks to make sure you never forget them. Make your way through the regretful hordes and hazardous terrain to find a form of peace at the top. Splintering With the power of Splintering, you have a second chance at 'life' after the regrets overwhelm you. However, you are defenseless and must survive the onslaught to regain your control. Vulnerability is what your regrets want. Items and Artifacts Encounter a variety of items and artifacts to help you on your journey. Items provide one-use destruction against the regretful hordes that plague you. Artifacts are lasting equipment that gives you a source of protection and aid. The Language of Na'en Listen to the original language of Na'en that the inhabitants speak from across the void in their own personal regret-filled prisons. You can find our language document at this link: .

Name: idle Party Leader
About the game: idle Party Leader is a narrative driven incremental game and a political satire which transcends the genre and goes into unfamiliar territory (and genres). Use manual clicks to make your way up the political ladder. Steal votes, use the army to threaten people to vote you and fight battles against protesters. Features - Collect (or steal) votes and spend them to earn more votes. - Ten autoclickers and over fifty upgrades to unlock. - Write the story of an autocrat in this political satire inspired by our planet's history (and by how people never learn to not repeat past mistakes). - Reveal, play and win mini-games while you tighten your grip on power. - Custom soundtrack support (save your music files as Track1.ogg or Track2.ogg or Track3.ogg and place them in the game's save dir). - Several secrets waiting to be found and deciphered.

It‚Äôs a challenging puzzle where you‚Äôll add colors and lines to a canvas to recreate abstract paintings. In the 2nd game you‚Äôll move to a big city, only to be overwhelmed with mixed emotions. You'll be exploring the maze of New York City while collecting words from a poem. In the 3rd game you‚Äôll help Boogie & Woogie, 2 squares who just want to be together, by figuring out how obstacles influence Woogie‚Äôs path, in a complex growing society. Three different games in one Simple controls Casual gameplay Fit for ages 13-99 No time-pressure, Zen-like Relaxing music Iconic universal art Fun art facts Quotes Lighthearted and bittersweet stories Calm but compelling Hints when stuck Over 160 levels 2~3 hours gameplay Coming Soon (no extra cost) - Infinite zen mode where you can play an infinite amount of puzzles at a certain difficulty - Screensaver mode : Impress your friends by putting the game on as a screensaver that auto-generates full-screen paintings at a chosen interval

Name: The Netrunner Awaken1ng
About the game: 2143. Incarnate an Artificial Intelligence in this numerical world where virtuality replaces reality. An ultra-dynamic and procedural parkour Die & Retry Hack the Matrix in The Netrunner Awaken1ng, an ultra-dynamic 3D first-person platform die & retry with fluid and fast-paced gameplay. In this challenging parkour game, speedrun, jump, slide, dive and dash at the beat of an adaptive electro-techno music to hack your way through each procedurally generated level. Rely solely on your matrix parkour skills to hack through these multiple deadly defense systems to steal the Datas and escape before the Disconnection(), alive! Features: Dynamic parkour gameplay : speedrun, jump, slide, dive and dash from wall to wall in this matrix world with responsive and precise controls. Use your multithreaded powers such as Dash333 and Pathfinder() to always find your way in space. Adaptive music, progressive stress : the electro-techno music adapts and the time accelerates according to your progress in the level to always keep you in the flow. Name: Honored
Developers: Trevor Babcock,Liam Crowley,James Clingan,Demetrious Reed,Paul Howald
About the game: Story In this alternate universe, the Egyptian empire was able to defend itself from various attacks and survive the tests of time up until the 19th century. The empire kept their religion as their base form for governing and declared all their laws to be divine. After years of the rest of the world resenting the empire for its prosperity, more armies from the north joined forces to bring the empire into their clutches. A coordinated attack on the Egyptian empire was in full force and for the first time, the empire of Egypt could not defend itself from the onslaught. The Egyptian empire managed to use their superior technology, with the Nile as their power source, to create powerful automatons to defend their empire from the invaders. After the great war, the empire decided to use these terrifying automatons as part of their police force, further oppressing the people. Many were slaughtered from the war, and many more from their own government. You play as a slave to the Egyptian empire that was born of sacred lineage, blessed by a religious leader that wishes to stop the oppressive nature of the empire. Your sacred lineage grants you awesome powers you can use to end the empire‚Äôs oppression once and for all or become a brand new tyrant the likes of which the world has never seen. Some Features Include: First-Person Gameplay Shooting Multiple Enemy Types Stealth Mechanics Otherworldly Abilities 'Play your Way' Missions

Name: Territory: Animals Genetic Strategy
About the game: Territory is an isometric 2D real-time single-player strategy about genes and animal species. Animals are behaving the way they would in nature, but you can indirectly control them and mutate them to achieve various goals. Game Highlights Evolve: update genes to change behavior of your species Eat: animals need to eat food to survive, define what food they can eat Reproduce: increase your population, improve fertility, prolong your life, hide better from predators, too high population leads to diseases Expand: expand your territories, migrate to new territories to increase your population further Fight: fight species that stands in your way Play for more than 40 species and mutate them or define your own species Play on 3 different biomes with more than 80 different genes Play 12 maps in 3 different modes - standard, custom, creative Core Gameplay Mechanics You are entering the game with one or more species and can add multiple species later on. You are changing the species genome and that is changing its attributes and behavior. You are playing on the maps with an existing ecosystem that is producing various sources of food. You can expand to new territories. You can invade enemy species. You can defend your territories. Species are hostile only when they share the same source of food and have similar size. You can have various goals like target biomass, biodiversity, or dominance in ecosystem. Species in the ecosystem can die out or can mutate to new species in time. Species can be herbivores, omnivores, or carnivores and can have one of four different sizes. Species lives complete life from being born to death, need food to survive. Each species has its own territory, its size and shape can be adjusted. Individual animal can die in a fight, starve to death, can be killed by a predator, die by disease, or die by old age. You are evaluating your surroundings and the ecosystem to determine your next steps. Species react indirectly to your commands if certain conditions are met (migrate to new territory only when not being hungry, have certain genes, etc.). Game Modes Standard mode where you play on a map with predefined goals and settings. Custom mode where you can change map settings like initial number of species or genes generation speed. Creative mode where you play on an empty map without any limitations. Join us on Discord

Name: Hologram

You are the only one with power enough to stop them. You¬¥re the hero. Lead the ultimate combat to save humanity from these terrible enemies. The time has come for leader Woner to regain his freedom. Play as Woner and meet the complete cast, filled with the game's complex and immersive characters, all with the most diverse motivations. Enjoy the cinematic action scenes and the fast-paced gameplay of the HOLOGRAM game. Join the Hologram war. Jetpack system: Fly over the battlefields and avoid mass attacks. Teleport: Use the Gateway to teleport from one location to another within the level.

Name: CrossHud - Crosshair Overlay
About the game: CrossHud allows you to use a custom crosshair reticle in your games. Full customization tools enable you to tweak and create the perfect crosshair for your game. Key Features Works in fullscreen and other window modes Both 64-bit and 32-bit games are supported Full crosshair editor to allow you to change color, crosshair type, offset etc all in real time while game is running Whitelist allows you to only allow specific games to use crosshair overlay Some games don‚Äôt allow third party overlays, in this case you can use the desktop crosshair option in fullscreen borderless or other window modes. CrossHud works exactly like other game overlay tools, you just need to make sure the game you are playing does not deny such enhancement in terms of service.

Name: Merge Cats - Idle Game
About the game: Merge Cats - Idle Game is a classic and simple merging game. The game is simple and relaxing - merge cats of the same level and unlock new cats! You can make your own collection of cute cats. Which cat is the cutest? Merge them and discover new cats. Are you ready to make the best cat collection in the cat world? Name: Vowel Movements
About the game: Overview In Vowel Movements you race against the clock to group words together into categories. The only catch is that each of the vowels has been replaced by a different vowel. Gameplay You are given a grid of 16 words that need to be grouped together into four categories before the timer expires. To make things slightly more tricky all of the words have had their vowels replaced by other vowels making them surprisingly difficult to read. If you‚Äôre stuck on a particular word you can trade some of your time to unscramble the vowels. There is also a time penalty for any set of words that is incorrectly grouped, so random guessing and blind clicking are probably not the way to go. Daily Challenge - Each day a puzzle will be set that is the same for everyone in the world. Will you be the first of your friends to solve it? Arcade Mode - There is also a mode that you can play anytime, where you receive a score based upon how quickly you complete each level. If you still think this all sounds far too easy, why not try to solve the puzzles in the trailer? Your challenge awaits...

Name: The Mostly Empty Theatre
About the game: Experience a woman's day of dirty public pleasure in this fully animated and voiced ASMR Visual Novel experience. Sit back, relax and progress through a linear story and immerse yourself with all your senses. Please use headphones for the perfect experience! Features 3D Fully Animated Fully voiced Subtitles Controls to replay scenes

Name: Lord Winklebottom Investigates
About the game: Lord Winklebottom Investigates is a 1920s murder mystery, point and click adventure featuring a dashing giraffe detective! Inspired by Agatha Christie and Sherlock Holmes, the game is a classic British murder mystery! It‚Äôs the 1920s and the world‚Äôs foremost detective is about to embark on his most challenging case yet. A mysterious invitation to an isolated island results in a grisly murder and a race against time to track down the killer. Thankfully, in this world that‚Äôs not quite like our own, there‚Äôs nobody better to crack the case than the great detective and gentleman giraffe, Lord Winklebottom. Join Lord Winklebottom and his steadfast companion Dr Frumple as they investigate the murder of their old friend. Uncover clues, interview suspects and solve puzzles to crack the case, capture the killer and uncover the horrifying dark secret at the heart of the Isle of Barghest! Full English voice acting. An original 1920s inspired soundtrack featuring live instruments. Play as a gentleman giraffe! Unique 2D hand painted artwork. Animals of all shapes and sizes! Streamlined point and click interface. Collection of bizarre characters to interrogate! Dozens of puzzles to solve!

Name: Mad Streets
About the game: Join our discord and communicate with the team. Offer suggestions, report issues etc.. Welcome to Gutsford University! Home of some of the toughest students in town. Will it be the Jocks or the Punks who run the town? Or perhaps the privileged Rich kids? Choose your fighter and settle some scores in this unique feeling physics party game! Mad Streets is a hilarious, physics based, beat-em-up party game that lets you pick a side, and brawl it out alone or with up to four friends local or online. Online mode is dedicated to run random and rumble modes and is purely based on the hosts internet connection. We advise players who want to play with friends and enjoy a more open experience to use steams Remote play feature or Parsec! The pick-up-and-play nature of Mad Streets is perfect for when you‚Äôre looking for a bit of instant fun, making it a perfect party game to settle some scores. Hilarious Physics Based Combat Target specific areas of the body, experiment with silly button combo attacks; and even throw out your ultimate special moves to become the champion! Features Mad Rush Mode - Build a team and run through a series of fights and objectives where you can unlock each faction‚Äôs story. In solo mode, recruit 3 AI companions to Mad Rush your way to the top. Random Matches - Similar to Mad Rush, but without the story based elements, Random Mode mixes straight up fighting, with its own lightning fast, unique objectives. Simply, the first to 5 points- wins! Rumble Mode - Simple versus tournament mode with no objectives, playing through Rumble mode unlocks new characters and locations. ONE PUUUUUNCH - Exactly what it sounds like! One punch, one winner. Enter the Stadium - A collection of all the different game objectives and special fights, allowing you to settle the score on any objectives you didn‚Äôt succeed in. Smash and grab - Pick up and throw anything you can see.If you can lift it, you can throw it! Throw bins, cans, trays... even your friends! Grab your fists and your friends! - You and up to four other players can compete head on in brawls, or join forces to complete team based objectives. Customise your matches by choosing how the match is judged, pick the location, or even include a referee to judge the bout.

Name: Space Voyager
About the game: Lofi space trips to chill to. Space voyager is a solo action/puzzle game with simple and effective gameplay. Swipe your way through space, but keep an eye of the fuel gauge ! With 50 levels to complete and a wide variety of obstacles, Space Voyager is a unique and challenging game with hours of gameplay. Content Simple gameplay to travel into space. Easy to learn, difficult to master. 50 levels with many different obstacles to cross. Extra challenge modes for each level : bronze, silver, gold, time and star medals. Original music and handcrafted audio.

Name: DouDas Danger
About the game: Doudas Danger 2D adventure about a village guy, an unusual platformer will throw you into the thick of hot skirmishes in the depths of a magical forest! The undead, slugs and mimics rebelled and stole all the treasures of the forest - your task is to return them. Can you complete this mission? Keep in mind that hordes of enemies and dangerous traps will interfere with you, and only dexterous and attentive players will be able to get to the very end. Peculiarities: - Nice graphics by IoIoF - Nice soundtrack loloF - unforgettable adventure

Name: Parapsychology
About the game: Parapsychology is a co-op horror game that can be played with 1-3 people. Find the demon in the house with your friends and destroy it with instructions. Experience horror together with your friends by destroying the demon in a faster and professional way. If you don't have friends, experience this challenging single player game. Name: Sniper Elite 5
About the game: The latest instalment in the award-winning series, Sniper Elite 5 offers unparalleled sniping, tactical third-person combat and an enhanced kill cam. Fight your way across the most immersive maps yet, with many real-world locations captured in stunning detail, and an improved traversal system that lets you explore more of them than ever before. France, 1944 ‚Äì As part of a covert US Rangers operation to weaken the Atlantikwall fortifications along the coast of Brittany, elite marksman Karl Fairburne makes contact with the French Resistance. Soon they uncover a secret Nazi project that threatens to end the war before the Allies can even invade Europe: Operation Kraken. EXPANSIVE CAMPAIGN Many real-world locations have been captured using photogrammetry to recreate a living, immersive environment, and multiple infiltration and extraction points and kill list targets provide a whole new perspective on each mission. Take on the Nazi plot solo or work with a partner, with improved co-op mechanics allowing you to share ammo and items, give orders and heal each other. ADVANCED GUNPLAY PHYSICS AND TRAVERSAL Use ziplines, slide down slopes and shimmy along ledges to reach the perfect vantage point, or to sneak past a sharp-eyed lookout. Factor in rifle stock and barrel options along with gravity, wind and heart rate while you line up your sights on the target. HIGH CALIBRE CUSTOMISATION Use workbenches to customise and upgrade virtually every aspect of your weapon ‚Äì change scopes, stocks, barrels, magazines and more. Rifles, secondaries and pistols all have a huge variety of options. On top of that you can select the ammo to suit your target, from armour-piercing right down to non-lethal. INVASION MODE ‚Äì CAMPAIGN DROP IN PvP AND CO-OP Invade another player‚Äôs Campaign as an Axis sniper and engage in a deadly game of cat and mouse, providing a new dimension to the challenge as you stalk your prey. Alternatively, as Karl you can call for assistance and have a second sniper drop in to help you out of a tricky situation. TENSE ADVERSARIAL MULTIPLAYER Customise your character and loadout and earn XP, medals and ribbons as you take on intensely competitive 16 player battles that will really test your sharpshooting skills. If co-op‚Äôs more your style, you can team up with up to 3 other players against waves of enemies in Survival mode. ENHANCED KILL CAM More realistic and grisly than ever, the trademark X-ray kill cam returns, showing you the true destructive power of each shot. Bones deflect bullets unpredictably, ripping a new path through enemy bodies. SMGs and pistols can also trigger kill cams, including multiple shots in dramatic slow motion.

Name: Godless grove
About the game: Godless grove - survival horror game with elements of an open world hunting simulator. Use decoys, traps and don't make too much noise ‚óè Fight terrible monsters and find a way to stop them forever ‚óè High difficulty, the decision to engage in direct combat can cost you a life

Name: Zako Slayer
About the game: Story A female super soldier, sleeping in a base, was released by accident during an attack by unknown intruders. Her memory is lost; she doesn't know who she is. The objective is to break through the enemies and escape from the base. Genre 2D Platformer, shooting in bullet hell style with hack and slash. Game play Close and range combat - Close combat with a sword like a warrior. - Shooting in Bullet hell style. Take cover behind an object, even the bodies of enemies and friends. - Sneak behind the enemies and attack them from behind or above. - Complex enemies' behavior. About 10-20 minute of gameplay.

Name: Pizza Delivery 3000
About the game: Leap into your hovercraft, fire up the laser cannons, and prepare for the ultimate game of 31st century cat-and-mouse. Strap in tight - you play a delivery driver in a town where pizza has been outlawed. Blast your way through the local robot police force or use speed and wit to avoid their detection as you race against the clock to deliver to hungry townsfolk their favorite, forbidden cheesy meal. Delivering pizza has never been so dangerous! Make deliveries in your hovercraft, which can be upgraded over time using tip money. Race against the clock, collecting higher tips the faster you safely deliver a pizza. Outrun and outwit the local robot police force or use your weapons to blast them enroute to your delivery. Learn to navigate your way through a small town that expands as you progress in your mastery of the game. Search for pages from the lost ‚ÄúBook of Za‚Äù to unlock powerful upgrades. Collect supplies along the way to upgrade the kitchen and continue the flow of forbidden za.

Name: Fire On Fight : Online Multiplayer Shooter
About the game: Fire On Fight : Online Multiplayer Shooter is a competitive online multiplayer first person shooter game with stunning 3D graphics and captivating gameplay. Select your unique soldier and weapons from tons of different soldiers and weapons of different classes and styles (Assault, SMG, Sniper, Shotgun, Pistol, Grenades, LMG, Heavy Machine Guns, Grenade Launcher, Knife ....) each one with special combat properties. Customize your own and unique class pearks and weapon accessoires (Laser, Sight Scope, Silencer ,Recoil Reducer ....) and jump into the action. Enter the battle and engage in intense team online PvP combat against other players around the world on a variety of great maps. Play with or against your friends in both online, local or private team death match mode or free for all match mode. The controls are intuitive and super easy to master with sweet user interface. Fire On Fight : Online Multiplayer Shooter is an actively developed shooter game, new maps, weapons, equipments ,pearks, characters and skins appear regularly in the game updates, as well as more game modes under development. The developers are improving the game optimization and matchmaking system with each new update, providing the best possible gaming experience for FPS shooter fans.

Name: Mechabot Defender
About the game: Survive against the ever-growing mechanical horde for 20 increasingly difficult waves! A New Blend of Arena-Survival Mechabot Defender is an arena-survival game similar to 'Vampire Survivors' and '20 Minutes Till Dawn', but instead of wielding weapons directly, you must defend yourself with two turrets that can both automatically fire, as well as be manually controlled. Each character also has a unique ability at their disposal! Resource Management Instead of collecting XP, you are guaranteed an upgrade at the end of every wave. However, your turrets will run out of ammo, and you'll need to bring your best dodging skills to weave through the horde and pick up their corpses to recycle for scrap. Scrap can be used to reload turrets, repair yourself, and even reroll your upgrade choices at the end of a wave! Unique Builds Every Run Each turret can be upgraded individually, so you can have two builds at once! What about a Fire & Ice combo? Or Explosives & Orbitals? What about a run where you dump every upgrade into one turret and see how far it can take you? Your character can also be upgraded throughout a run! Unique Foes There are currently 6 enemy types in the game, all with different stats, and gimmicks, and some even have their own movement patterns. These enemies can range from shield-wielders to swerving vehicles, flyers that ignore obstacles, and ammo-stealers! NO META PROGRESSION Although there are characters and stages to unlock, the game contains no persistent upgrades , so the game remains challenging no matter how long you play! Features üî≤ Tower Defence mechanics: your turrets are your weapons. üî≤ 'Bullet' Hell gameplay where the enemies are the bullets. üî≤ Upgrade your turrets separately and create two completely unique synergies! üî≤ A mixture of automatic and manual control: let your turrets handle it, or tether to them to aim yourself! üî≤ Several unique enemies with their own behaviours and gimmicks. üî≤ Entirely optional lore to be unlocked!

Name: Warriors of the Nile 2
About the game: Warriors of the Nile are back! Building up on the original version's [Turn-based Strategy+Roguelite] framework, in Warriors of the Nile 2 you will once again experience iconic fast-paced, exhilarating combat. This time, you will lead warriors blessed by Egyptian gods and fight against the invading Roman army. Choose your adventure route. Strategize and make preparations amidst ever-changing stage conditions, then move with precision as you fire away. Create a unique skill build by choosing from an array of skill tablets. What's different from the original version is, in the new Warriors of the Nile squad, each character possesses a trademark skillset. Not only have attack modes changed, but the new feature-packed individual system will bring an all-new dynamic into the game. Choose a suitable skillset tablet for you, be it making a clean sweep at the battlefield, using multi-phased attacks and chain attacks to break through enemy lines, or using charge attack leaps to take out the back row...... Awaken the gods' blessings at key moments to unleash Miracle and turn the tides in your favor! Choose your route in adventure mode, visit merchants, and challenge powerful enemies; Light up carvings to gain more battle bonuses; Build a capital and restore the glory of pharaohs past; Level up your warriors to unlock new tablets and equipment.

Name: Zodiac fantasy 2

The girls will definitely thank you~‚ù§ Gameplay introduction: Players need to control the character by jumping or climbing, to achieve a variety of obstacles across the terrain or avoid and cross the trap, to reach the final target point to win. Game features: In the game, you will experience. - 11 beautiful CG - Brand new animation vertical drawing - A unique world view - A variety of interactive gameplay - Challenging levels (guaranteed not to make things difficult for you) - One click to skip Little sisters do not like toys and puppies, so they sadly left the place (this work will not appear to help him content), but this has not been quiet for a few days, a new group of cute and interesting girls moved in, immediately became lively again, they also quickly get along to become good friends. Character List Character: Rabbit Setting: Cute and meta, with the nature of a rabbit Character: Cow Setting: Dull and cute, as if always asleep Character: Sheep Setting: Looks soft and fluffy, but I hear she always seems to be getting into trouble Character: Snake Setting: A gentle, caring big sister who you can talk to about any troubles Character: Mouse Setting: Short and small girl, but not very forgiving on the mouth About Us Hello, we are Lovely Game, desire, throbbing, we are eager to give you the purest romance. Because we want to provide you with a more convenient gaming experience, we have now launched the official Lovely Games website, so you can get our latest information anytime, anywhere, and if you encounter any problems in the game, you can also choose to raise them in the community F&Q discussion or the official steam group~. Thanks for the love.

Name: Albert and Puzzle Mansion
About the game: Albert's cat has been abducted! Enter the mansion and solve puzzles in order to find and rescue the cat! This is a short and lighthearted puzzle game where you move blocks in a certain order to open the door to the next floor. Use your problem solving skills and make your way through the mansion! More puzzle mechanics appear as you traverse the mansion.

Name: Planet Conqueror
About the game: Planet Conqueror is FPS science fiction game where you have to collect minerals exploring different planets. The main goal in the game is to upgrade your gear up to be able to defeat the Alien boss. Each planet generates randomly, making the possibility to explore 10 000+ different planets! Also, the side quest is to find the 3 lost astronauts. In the random planets, you can find 5 different minerals which could be sold. -coal -sodalite -emerald -ruby -gold Each mineral is higher in value. In the space stop, you can upgrade your gear to make exploring the planet easier. In the space stop you can upgrade: -movement speed -jump height -laser power -mineral drop rate -ultimate powers -space ship fuel Be careful because on each planet there is a chance of aliens! By dying on the planet you will lose half of your minerals. Also, you can Conquer the planet by raising the flag in a certain spot. You can play 2 challenges and submit your score to Steam leaderboards. - 20-minute planet conquer challenge (Conquer as many planets in 20 minutes) - 20-minute mineral challenge (Collect as many minerals in 20 minutes) Also, you can submit your total conquered planets and mined minerals score to Steam leaderboards.

Name: Fire Commander
About the game: THIS IS A WAY OF LIFE How would it feel to head a group of firefighters and manage a fire station? Facing the fire and making decisions that can affect the lives of many people? Now you have the chance to experience it in Fire Commander! THE MANY FACES OF FIREFIGHTING From extinguishing fires, to saving people and valuable equipment, experience a variety of environments and dangers, including the risk of a toxic spill. Manage your people and water supplies. Be free to utilize different vehicles, class specializations and tools. Creatively combining them, discover multiple ways of dealing with any situation. In action, consider such factors as backdraft, smoke, or materials with a different combustion temperature. The welfare of your crew and the success of the missions depend on your decisions. STAND BEHIND YOUR PEOPLE'S BACK Putting your life on the line together can form strong bonds between you and your crew. The team becomes your family. Take care of your people, before and during rescue actions. Send your firefighters on training courses and develop their skills. Be sure that during emergencies, everyone will know what to do. FEATURES Different classes of firefighters 30+ thrilling missions Experience system with unlockable skills Numerous rescue vehicles and a growing fire station Story and side missions An enemy you cannot outpower, only outsmart Face the Fire!

Name: GHOSTKEEPER
About the game: GHOSTKEEPER - the player controls a platform that can be moved by placing it under the bone, preventing it from falling on the skulls. Hitting a brick with a bone leads to the destruction of the whole brick. After all the bricks at this level are destroyed, the transition to the next level takes place with a new set of bricks in large quantities. - 15 unique interesting levels - exciting gameplay - old school music - unusual design webpunk

Name: Helga the Viking Warrior 2: Ivar's Revenge
About the game: After the battles she once fought against her enemies, Helga at last knows peace. A new deal with the king has provided the Vikings with land in England, and she is among those who settle down to live a new life. Unfortunately, this peace is not to last‚Ä¶ When betrayal leads to the death of a hero, Helga and the young Viking leader Ivar find themselves faced with new enemies and overwhelming odds. Ivar is determined to defeat his enemies by any means necessary, and he begins amass an army. But is allying with him in this war the right decision to make? And what will come later, after the two sides have clashed in battle? - A thrilling adventure of a Viking warrior - Challenging match-3 puzzles to solve - 20 upgrades to unlock as Helga pursues her mission - New characters to meet and locations to visit - 5 chapters to enjoy alongside a legendary Viking warrior

Name: Rule The World
About the game: You are the mercenaries sent to do the jobs no government will take responsbility for, but somebody has to end evil! Attack enemies, traverse perilous terrain, and secure objectives all in the name of world peace... welcome to the war to Rule The World.

Name: Knight Princess Eris
About the game: ‚ÄúKnight Princess Eris' is an action game with over 800 pieces of pixel art, a classic retro and smooth pixel art animation. World The kingdom 'Gilthania' was destroyed by the invasion of the demon tribe. Men were killed and women were made to be comforted... The pursuers are closing in on the exiled princess knight 'Eris,' who has escaped alone. Now, Eris's journey of revenge begins... Game Features „ÉªEasy to operate! „ÉªArmor gets destroyed as you take damage! „ÉªThe voiced and smooth pixel art animation adult scenes are of high quality! (All voices are Japanese) Game System „ÉªEris has 3 points of HP, and each time her HP decreases, her armor is destroyed: armor, half-naked, and fully naked. If you die, you can recover immediately on the spot. (You can also recover at the place where you moved to.) „ÉªAttacks are powered up with items available during the stage. No detailed manipulation is required. When the attack button is pressed, the item is activated at the same time as the attack. (The item is activated only when the attack button is pressed with no directional key input.) ('Fireball' and 'Bom' are also activated by crouching attacks.) „ÉªStepping on the 'H button' during a stage will 'disable' all female mob enemies. (Does not work on mid-boss enemies and non-female enemies) „ÉªAs you clear the stages, adult scenes will open up. You can enjoy various adult scenes, including maniac scenes. Adult scenes are fully voiced and fully animated. „ÉªThere are several unique monsters in the game. You can choose to 'continue' indefinitely, so the game is not difficult.

Name: UuultraC
About the game: An 18+ BL visual novel set in 1970's Soshigaya. Kaiju straight out of a black-and-white TV terrorize a Japan without a world's fair. Tokyo's safety is in the hands of Sun Mask Icarus in this slapstick-yet-heavy 70's pro-wrestling kaiju drama! Story March, 1970. Shoutarou lives together with his boyfriend, Kozuka, in Soshigaya, Tokyo. Society sees people turning into kaiju as an infectious disease. With one side protesting for acceptance of those infected, there is a restlessness in the air. Shoutarou is an advocate for justice, but his life changes in a big way after he's drenched in kaiju blood. There are kaiju, superheroes, giant robots, and three protagonists in this avant-garde tokusatsu drama filled with relics of the Showa Era. Features Traditional Visual Novel Developed by the same creator as Hashihime of Old Book Town Over 1800 CGs to explore!

Name: Bad Guy: Neighborhood
About the game: Bad Guy: Neighborhood is a unique open world free roam style game. Complete objectives, mini games, and fight bosses to earn money and unlock unique items and abilities in the store. Encounter special enemies and find hidden secrets as you explore a violent and unpredictable neighborhood. Features 15+ unique weapons and abilities Unique Arrest/'Police' system Special date-able characters 5 boss fights to beat Objective and task progression system Time rated mini-games Borderline psychopathic game-play options Unknown secrets that unlock super secret things (very secret) Continuous open-world, do whatever you want Chaotic NPCs constantly fighting/killing each other Customizable NPC amount (more/less chaos)

Name: Solar Echoes: The Star Legation
About the game: STORY In the beginning, the universe was not a friendly place. As the alien races began to discover each other, hostilities erupted and eventually grew from skirmishes into violent wars. A plan has been made to build an alliance and you, Trey Donovan, have been chosen to represent humanity! Journey through space to strange new worlds and meet with powerful alien leaders. Bring back a representative from each alien race to join the Interstellar Union. This mission will prove we can all get along, work together, and unify peacefully. During your mission, you must know when to use your clever wit, an aggressive tone, or a conciliatory approach. Do not worry, this is a diplomatic legation and there is minimal risk: nobody will attack the representatives and cause an interstellar incident. ABOUT Solar Echoes: The Star Legation is a Sci-Fi Visual Novel game with RPG elements, full of intriguing alien characters, bizarre foreign cultures, and interstellar conflict. Journey through space to gather and manage an alien crew, visit new worlds, negotiate with alien leaders, and even risk romance across the stars! Survival and success depends upon your choices and the reputation you've built among your alien crewmates. Can your diplomatic efforts with alien leaders lead to a peaceful alliance between all the races, or will you incite a massive interstellar war? Will your words bring unity, or chaos? FEATURES The Star Legation‚Äôs beautifully authentic style blends realism with a cel-shaded, anime touch. Design, art, and audio create a unique space-opera atmosphere. 100's of decisions to make in this epic, choice-driven branching story where your decisions really matter! Experience an engaging narrative filled with intrigue, humor, science, treachery, and heart. RPG elements with 8 different character design skill choices to make 32 possible endings (including 5 main endings) Immersive and realistic dialogue: some character sprites have over 100 different expressions! Optional Romance story routes with 2 human characters Detailed background art, cinematic camera work, expressive character sprites, and animated sequences make this visual novel a dynamic experience! Build relationships with memorable characters and develop reputations with each that will alter the course of the story! Over 12 hours of gameplay, with additional hours in alternate routes and endings Awesome SciFi soundtrack by composer Andy Mitchell, featuring over 90 minutes of original music! 15+ High Res CG's to unlock, designed by the talented artist, Aeghite! Hidden skill-related choices based on your character design that unlock extra routes and content Kinetic Combat (auto-play/auto-win), or Challenge Mode All 5 main endings each voice acted by 3 different voice actors

Name: Cosplay Simulator
About the game: This is a gallery simulator with a wealth of costumes and various sex scenes for viewing. The operation is intuitive and simple, there is no long game puzzle solving process, the game can be watched immediately, and it is suitable for players who want to see the ending quickly. , This work is not yet the final version, and new characters and sex scenes will be added one after another to satisfy the rich imagination of players! ‚ôªThis is a derivative work of sword x hime, it can be regarded as an independent version of the gallery‚ôª The H action in the gallery is the same, friends who have purchased the sword x hime game, please consider The difference between this work and the sword x hime version is the addition of multiple characters and a new lighting system Body dynamics, cloth and hair dynamics, pantyhose quality, have been enhanced under the new engine Compact structure, smaller capacity and faster execution Streamlined costumes and monsters to minimize the problem of model interspersed ‚ôªIf you find that you cannot play smoothly after purchase, please apply for a refund immediately‚ôª My major is art, I just learned programming few months, I can't solve difficult system conflicts, please forgive me (‚óû‚Ä∏‚óü) Under normal circumstances, as long as the graphics card conforms to DirectX 12, Windows10 system, 16GB Ram can run smoothly The stability of the Mac/Linux emulator is unclear

Name: Underworld Island
About the game: Underworld Island is a horror thriller with Full-motion video interactive story game. Discover the truth about the Samsara on the Underworld Island. You must make the right choice every step of the way to save your daughter and jump out of the cycle of death. The Background Of The Stroy This is the beginning and the end of fate. This is the hell you want to escape the most, and glean hope of your survival. Dead or alive, gain or lose, is only a matter of choice. A father who took his daughter to find his wife on a small island discovered the island is full of supernatural things, which are as creepy as the name of this island 'Huangquan'. The widespread ghost fog brings unknown dangers, constantly threatening the safety of his daughter and him. What is more incomprehensible is that a little girl in red always haunts him like a ghost! He tries to escape with his daughter, only to find that there is no way out of this strange island, not even death! He had to relive the death of his daughter and his own again and again. Whether to become the devil himself through resentments, or to be drowning in the endless cycles, or to redeem and save the happiness once were, this is all written by your choices! Game Features Original Gameplay Of Samsara Samsara: the cycle of death and rebirth to which life in the material world is bound. When you have made a previous choice that caused you to die in the game, it allows you to instantly go back to that moment and make the choice again. This is the wonder of samsara. Customized Personality The character's personality influences the decision content during the in-game interaction. The decision of different personality differs the story's direction Panoramic exploration This provides several scenes to explore omnidirectionally, which buried a lot of information. It provides an all-around gaming experience only for you! Key Clues: Mostly are video contents that drive the plot. Graphic Imformation: The combination of images and inner monologue texts, reveals the essence of this world step by step. Hidden Clues: Find out the hidden clues left by your predecessors, and you may have a different perception of this world. Random Paranormal Events: Seemingly ordinary objects, but may give you the heebie-jeebies! Multiple Endings Multiple endings, multiple understanding of the worldview, diversified character evaluations. 'There are a thousand Hamlets in a thousand people's eyes.' One thought of persistent, that is, alive; all that matters perishes, that is, dead.

Name: TimeShifters
About the game: The year is 2131, the world is held hostage under a dictator who created a time machine to change his past to rise to power, your job is to go back and stop him from succeeding but be careful as he has sent his TimeShifters to stop you! Cause mayhem like its the year 2000 again with fast paced gameplay and tons of weapons at your disposal! Take on challenges and try get all the platinum trophy's, learn the layout of every level and difficulty and try to beat your time! Challenges can consist of pig racing, flying an apache, playing chicken with train, being a firefighter, pint smashing and much more! Environments have lots of detail to interactive with like smashing windows, potting ball on a pool table, smashing plates, blowing up crates or even using the items in the environment like a fire extinguisher! 9 STORY MISSIONS. 30+ CRAZY CHALLANGE MISSIONS. INTERACT WITH YOUR ENVIRONMENT. PLAY ONLINE AGAINST OTHERS IN MODES LIKE DEATHMATCH, TEAM DEATHMATCH, VIRUS AND MANY MORE!.

Name: Operation: Pinkeye
About the game: Operation: Pinkeye is a first-person shooter throwing back to shooters from the 90s by the likes of Rareware and Free Radical Design. Set in an alternate Universe where the Acts of Union in 1707 never happened, Scotland and England remain independent and tensions between the 2 remain very high. A journalist has been killed in a hotel in London near a political rally, his room was ransacked, as if their murderers were looking for something. It was believed that he held important documents containing plans by the English to invade Scotland. Fearing that this is the case, The Scottish Secret Service (The SSS) assign their best agent, Ken Maxwell, to obtain the stolen documents, and find out exactly what they're planning. Traverse through 15 levels of high-octane spy action, with music from the composer of Planet X3, and FMV cutscenes filmed in Scots! Features Relive memories of '90s era shooters without the annoying bits Faithful old-school graphics Multiple language support, including Scots and Gaelic! Customisable mechanics and controls! Music from the composer of Planet X3 and Half-Life: Dark Matter
