Name: Frog lands
About the game: rog lands is a metroidvania action game made in the style of the old Zelda, you are waiting for mysterious labyrinths, twilight forests and open space to save the frog lands from evil wizards who have established their terrible laws everywhere and everything. Solve riddles, go through dangerous traps and overthrow the dark magician! Features: music by Fentuck graphic by Youlili more 40 locations

Name: I Am Sakuya: Touhou FPS Game
About the game: This is a unofficial fangame of the Touhou Project series. It is permitted under the official guidelines. Please support the official releases, some of which are available on Steam! Features Intense FPS gameplay with the perfect mix of bullet hell! No cheap hitscan enemies! Just pure shooting and dodging skills! Stop time and annihilate your enemies! Epic boss battles that will test your reflexes! A colourful cast featuring favorites from the Touhou Project! An awesome soundtrack to keep your adrenaline pumping throughout the game! Unique weapons that are versatile for almost any situation, such as bouncing knives! We have a QUAD BARRELED SHOTGUN IN THE GAME!! Story A mysterious mansion has suddenly appeared in Gensokyo, with the shrine maiden insistent on sitting this out until something happens, one of the legendary humans, Sakuya Izayoi, decides to investigate, she gears up and exits the human village towards the mansion, unbeknownst to her that this is the start of her new life...

Name: Miss LU
About the game: Classic elimination+CG casual game. Players gain combat power by eliminating. When the countdown is over, you attack BOSS and accept BOSS's attack. After defeating BOSS, you can unlock the exquisite CG accordingly. Friends who like collecting MM, come quickly!

Name: GrappleWell
About the game: GrappleWell is a physics based rage game that will have you climbing up from the bottom of a well. You, (as a coin who been thrown down a well) naturally can only move via grapple hook, but beware, grapples are not an infinite resource! they recharge quickly while you are touching the ground and slowly in the air. Many a young coin has tried and failed to escape the dreaded well, could your tale be one of legends?

Name: Japanese DoJo
About the game: This game contains the JLPT-N5-level difficulty course, which is ideal for those who are just starting to learn Japanese, or those who are interested in learning Japanese but don't know how to start. Details of the game include the pronunciation and writing of kana, as well as elementary grammar and syntax, of course the entire course is covered phonetically. After the lesson, you can try to consolidate your kana learning in 'Bow Dojo', practice your vocabulary memorization in 'Kendo Dojo', and challenge the powerful grammar ninja to improve your Japanese ability in all aspects. The program will summarize your weaknesses based on your performance and optionally reinforce them.

Name: Cyber Runner
About the game: This is a fast-paced endless running and avoiding game. The levels are all randomly generated by the program and can be challenged forever. Players need to control the characters to run forward and avoid obstacles on the left and right, and jump to avoid falling into the abyss. Gameplay Keep running forward and avoid obstacles. Players can run left and right and jump. Collect energy bar to accumulate higher scores. Game Features Support Steam leaderboard. Support Steam achievements.

Name: NFL PRO ERA
About the game: NFL PRO ERA is the first fully licensed NFL virtual reality (VR) simulation game that lets players experience what it‚Äôs like to compete as the QB of their favorite NFL team. Coming this fall and utilizing real-time NFL game data, NFL PRO ERA is one of the most authentic and immersive first-person VR football games ever to come to market. Athletes will be able to step under center and see if they have what it takes to compete at the highest level and make the big plays. Lead your team to a Super Bowl, improve your QB skills by participating in drills, or play catch virtually with your friends in your favorite NFL stadium. As a NFL QB you‚Äôll feel the excitement of what it‚Äôs like to lead your team and compete under the bright lights with thousands of screaming fans. Developed by StatusPRO, Inc., a company founded by athletes with a mission to democratize the professional athlete experience, NFL PRO ERA brings fans closer to the gridiron than they've ever been before.

Name: The Backroom Project
About the game: An atmospheric Horror game inspired by the popular internet creepypasta, The Backrooms. In theory if we can somehow break the laws of physics and clip through an object, we can noclip out of bounds in normal reality. This may occur by an accident in most cases, but when it happens, you end up there. The Backrooms are a seemingly infinite non-linear space. All rooms in Level 0 appear uniform and share superficial features such as yellowed wallpaper, damp carpeting, electrical outlets, and inconsistently placed fluorescent lighting. However, no two rooms within the level are identical. Linear space in Level 0 is altered drastically; it is possible to walk in a straight line and return to the starting point, and end up in a completely different set of rooms than the ones previously passed through. That was a myth for long, but now scientists discovered a new way of entering. They have made a lot of experiments and now they can say entering is totally safe and easy. They are having scientists there with experimenting motive and now looking for civil people to send in. They are really friendly and respecting your needs. Then you get sent into the backrooms and find yourself alone. Where are the others? Explore the Backrooms with a Camera and a Pedometer. Don‚Äôt try to memorize the rooms or where you came from, this is the Backrooms. You are alone and these yellow walls and that sound of the lamps starting to drive you crazy. You hate that weird feeling you get there. Are you sure you are alone? Is it just your mind?

Name: Cubelander
About the game: MORE THAN A TOWER DEFENCE - Cubelander is a fast paced tower-defence game, where you defend the sacred Cubeverse against hostile forces, and discover the singularity that is summoning these geometrical invaders. Immerse yourself inside Symmetria and find the backstory behind every faction. Not everything is as it seems... A VERSATILE ARSENAL - There are multiple distinct methods to play Cubelander! Will you let your towers take the front seat, bolstering your defensive capabilities, and decimating enemies, or build up a resource empire, for powerful energy-consuming towers? Or will you rely on your faithful defenders and support towers to do such a job, and take a hands-on approach? Or will you fire orbital strikes everywhere and obliterate waves of enemies? Cubelander makes a tower defence map ever more interactive, with enemies defenders and towers seamlessly interacting amongst each other! Discover every combination of synergizing towers, and master the distinct playstyles! INTERACTIVE MAPS - Fight inside 4 unique environments! (We're not going to spoil), and overcome the unique challenges of each environment, and use the track to your advantage. Defeat each kind of enemy, which each possess a different, significant threat to the safety of your cores! Play through some levels with just ONE tower to place down, other levels where you cannot generate resources, and more! BRUTAL BOSSFIGHTS - Take on the strongest commanders of the Geometric Invasion - from a cubic nightmare, to the leader of the geometric void himself! Fight heart-stopping bossfights that test your tower defence skills (and quick decision making) with multi-phased bossfights that have a wide range of attacks! EASY OR... INFURIATINGLY DIFFICULT - Adjust the difficulty of the game as you wish. Play on Normal for a laid back experience, (or for the lore) or play on Invictus mode and have to re-learn the game again, with new mechanics such as a rage bar, stronger and more tenacious enemies, and reworked bossfight AIs (Only for the most brave and daring). Test your strategical prowess in elite wormhole stages, and acquire unique towers and defenders to assist you along the way! This game designed is for EVERYONE. Whether you are a tower defence champion or just a casual player, the game has something for YOU. A complete beginner would feel totally comfortable starting at 1-1 on Normal mode, whereas a pro may go for those wormhole stages on Invictus Mode (Insane boss raids on the highest difficulty level) Nothing is unbeatable with thorough planning and strategising.

Name: NeverDeath
About the game: Brawl your way across the solar system as nine distinct characters ranging from a sword wielding space acrobat to a fifteen foot tall monstrosity from the ocean depths of Neptune as you explore the intricacies of the unique left/right combat system and witness the achievements of mankind after 200 years in space. The left/right combat adds in new ways to attack and lets players choose between avoiding attacks through movement or standing their ground and retaliating, choosing correctly is often the difference between victory and defeat. Settings range from a technologically advanced Earth to the foggy capital city of Venus to the uncharted and storm ravaged surface of Neptune. Brawl as the snow falls or as the sun shines, crouch to hide in the tall grass or keep to the shadows. In NeverDeath, there is more to think about than just how your character fights. The nine distinct characters have their own distinct play styles and varied speed, health, damage, attack range and health regeneration rates. All these come together to make each character feel unique and powerful. Will you opt for the consistent damage and all around stats of the engineer or frustrate your enemies as an all but impossible to kill reptilian of unknown origin? Will you move in for the kill with dual knives or keep your distance with a trident? Will you subtly outmaneuver your enemies as a sword wielding female ninja or annihilate them before you die as a 15 foot monster that takes constant damage? Buy now to begin your journey!

Name: War of Wizards
About the game: Draw & cast your spells, magic showdown! War of Wizards is a VR game with MOBA confrontation. Draw dragons to summon dragons to fight for you, draw fireballs to summon fireballs to shoot at enemies, draw pills to heal yourself... You can cast different spells by drawing different patterns, and the accuracy and size of the spells you make will affect the damage and range of the spells you cast. It's a game that uses both your reflexes and your strategy skills. The spells you choose to use depends on your judgment of the enemy player and what strategy you plan to use to achieve victory. You can also dodge attacks flying towards you by dodging your body. Lead your minions to victory against the enemy! Features: - PVP MOBA! - Draw & cast your spells! - Dodge the skills that the enemy fires at you! - Use strategy to lead minions to destroy enemy magic crystals! bugs and feedback warofwizardsvr@gmail.com

Name: Tigey's Gift
About the game: 'When you have an unfortunate life, you better create a phantom, love her, glory her and feed her with biscuits in your imagination, defend her with your life. This is how we remember our kitty Tigey with cerebellar hypoplasia only lived 8 months. We want to present you a best kitty a family could have and how she lived and saved our lives. Would you like to take a sit with a cup of coffee with us and pet Tigey?' Tigey's Gift is a mini game from game developer(me) to show his love to cats he had in the past years. I made this game to help my wife and I not to drown in sorrow, to accept the loss of our special friend, Tigey. She will never grow up but she will stay in my memory and this game or some other people who know her story. It's a game based on real story with short films and addictive PING PONG arcade puzzle game rather than a walking simulator type. Feature - Addictive and replayable Arcade puzzle game. Shoot 5 different balls to feed the cat with tuna, catnip, love, toys and water. Essential things for all cats. Game will be harder if you have better skill. Trigger passive rewards to win more score. - Try to beat your score every time you play. - Short times to play: You only need to spend 20 minutes every turn. - Reasonable but tough achievements are waiting for your challenge! - Discover the story about Tigey. Beat the score to unlock more stories. Stay with Tigey and accompany her in her trip. Short films about the story of kitty Tigey.

Name: The Last One Month
About the game: The Kingdom Namiroien is about to fall into chaos, as the forces of the Dark Lord is approaching to conquer and destroy everything in its path. The King has summoned many mercenaries and warriors, such as yourself, to protect his country from the incoming dark forces. However, only one chosen hero is deemed worthy of facing the Dark Lord himself‚Ä¶ The Last One Month is a unique mix of Battle Royale, Survival RPG and Turn-based Strategy games where you become one of 50 warriors and battle each other to become the hero who will save the kingdom. Your goal is to become the dominant force, by all means necessary, to become the chosen hero. You can wander around the kingdom to find treasures, recruit allies, form alliances with other warriors, gain experience from battles against those who stand in your way, and whatever else you believe is necessary. Like other Survival Battle Royale games or auto battler games, players join in a 30 minutes-campaign to become the last one standing. Then as you move on to the next game, a fresh new battle with 50 other players begins, where you partake in a complex and engaging strategic battles with many different choices for character growth and ally combinations that dictate the outcome. Key features > Explore the world and survive the competition ‚Äì Explore the kingdom to loot treasure chests, gain experience to develop your character, and recruit allies to build up a powerful force that can defeat other competing warriors in your way to becoming the hero who can defeat the dark forces. > Prepare yourself for the final battle ‚Äì As time passes in the game, available area starts to get closed off as dark forces start invading the kingdom. Avoid them at all cost while gathering whatever resources you can, and fending off other competitors trying to eliminate you and take whatever you have left. > Develop your character into a worthy hero ‚Äì As your character explores the world, you gain experience to develop your character into a true hero. You can choose between up to 8 different classes as you level up your character further, each class specializing in one weapon type. > Recruit NPCs and other players to help your cause ‚Äì You can recruit or bribe existing NPCs into your army to help you in battles to come, or join forces with others to protect yourselves from other players with stronger army. > Turn-based Strategy Combat that requires quick thinking ‚Äì The combat system provides infinite possibilities with your recruited NPC composition, battle formations, your character class and weapon choices, combined with any split second decision you make within the 5 second time window you have in your turn, such as attacking directly or skipping your current turn to use more powerful skill later on. > Talent and Item Specialization system ‚Äì These are skill points you can allocate as you play more games. They are bound to your account affecting and enhancing your gameplay style by adding a different element of strategy available to your actions in-game, such as upgrading your consumable items to surprise your opponents. > Form or break alliances with other players ‚Äì You can form an alliance with other players, join in their battles to help them out and overcome overwhelming forces. Or, you can choose betray and backstab them at a crucial moment to take advantage. > Miniature, War Game-like art styles ‚Äì Graphical styles reminding of miniature board war games, along with over 20 costumes available for you to customize your character to your liking.

Name: Timmy Types
About the game: Don't swipe - type! Improve your typing speed with this endless runner game. In the 2010s the world went crazy for mobile endless runner games like Subway Surfers and Temple Run in which you swipe your away around obstacles and try to see how far you can make it before crashing. Timmy Types is a creative twist on the genre in that you type words to navigate your environment. The only interesting typing game I've found on Steam is Typing of The Dead: Overkill . The game is a great arcade experience that you navigate using your keyboard instead of a gun, and I really want to play other similar games. Unfortunately Typing of the Dead isn't really suitable for kids and there aren't really any other comparable games out there. And this is why Timmy Types was created. It is our first experiment in developing a fun family-friendly typing game. We appreciate your support of our game! We're working tirelessly, creating new prototypes and always thinking of ways to breathe life into the typing game genre. Hope you enjoy Timmy Types and please stay tuned because there's more to come!

Name: monsterLabShooter
About the game: This game was inspired by alien shooter games, but this game intended for players to have fun with the game itself. don't focus on difficulty The plot was the result of a researcher's mistake that allowed the spiders. slipped into a test tube thus resulting in mutation and spread to living things There are 9 levels in the game, the player is given a mission to plant a c4 bomb, each zone will be blocked by monsters. Players can use firearm shooting skills, electric swords, exhaustion and dodge to complete missions.

Name: Exos Heroes
About the game: The grand adventure to search for ‚ÄòExestruk‚Äô, the missing sword of the emperor, and the curse of the ancient dragon! Face the evil forces threatening the peace of the Exos Continent! ‚ñ† Ride on the ancient Airship awoken from a deep slumber to go an adventure! Welcome to the mystical fantasy land where Airships roam the sky. Become the Airship captain and feel the vast world! Join the ancient dragon Bitru and treasure hunter Zeon in this original RPG Experience this fascinating story unfold before your eyes. ‚ñ† Walk and run! World-map with freedom! This world is full of exciting contents where you can explore the lost ruins and hunt for lost treasures. Experience the unique contents of Exos, the original RPG on mobile! ‚ñ† Epic graphics! It‚Äôs not a cinematic video! Intense battles in a fairytale-like world! Thrilling skill actions! Experience the true fun of turn-based game through strategic battles! Illustrations of beautiful characters, and the fantasy world of magnificent landscapes. ‚ñ† Enjoy a new type of RPG with battle system like no other! Take advantage of Guardian Stone system to ‚Äòbreak‚Äô the enemy, and add more fun to strategic battles! ‚ñ† The quality of every single character in the game are as fine as the main character! Collect more heroes! Collect over 250 heroes with unique character designs, and enjoy the awesome play with powerful Fatecore! Fiery intense battles will bring satisfaction to both your eyes and heart!

Name: Spellcaster
About the game: Gameplay In Spellcaster you control a mage who has to defend his hut from hordes of monsters. Lots of bullets and spells to choose from which you can buy from local store. Choose your build before the next level and face the creatures in this top-down, tower defence, shoot 'em up, action game. Story You lived peacefully in the middle of a dark forest. Gathering herbs, creating potions, and studying magic were your daily activities. It was like that until terrifying monsters started haunting you. Who ordered them to disturb your peace? Plunge yourself in the fantasy world by following the story of the old wizard and reading the rich descriptions in the bestiary. Modes Two modes available: campaign and freeplay. The campaign include structured levels with epic boss fights that end in fighting the main villain. Freeplay is an endless gameplay with randomly generated levels. Check yourself how far you can go! Atmosphere Beautiful, warm colors. Bright, cartoon, fantasy graphics. Atmospheric music.

Name: Brick Breaker
About the game: A game about destroying bricks and stop them from spreading. Unlock balls with unique attacks that help you get further and defeat all 14 bosses. Build up a base, gather resources and use them to improve your stats. Your goal is to defeat all 14 bosses. But the bricks are there to hurt and kill you if they spread and get too close to your base! +10 unique balls with 3 different upgrades each +14 different bosses with unique deadly attacks +Equip your base with lasers, farms, mines and other upgrades +Tutorial that help you get started +Steam achivements +Highscore and top list +Over 240 different maps

Name: 2089 - Space Divided
About the game: In the sci-fi RTS game '2089 - Space Divided' you will become the commander of one of three factions. Go into battle for your faction on alien worlds and fight for power and wealth, or maybe just for bare survival. Be smarter than your opponents and secure your dominance on the battlefield. Whether through guerrilla tactics or huge war machinery is your decision. The Andarer are very technically proficient. Discipline and excellence are a must for every young cadet. Sophisticated weapons and strong fortifications make their bases almost impregnable. The Redaxh definitely do not look human. More like insects, ugly insects. The technologies are massively different from the other factions. The weapon systems are incredibly advanced and devastating, but the structures look fragile. Still, you'd better run from their arms. Everything about the Zan seems cobbled together. Weapon systems seem outdated, not made for open combat. On the other hand, they are extremely adept at attacking from ambush and are difficult for the enemy to see. 'A business that only makes money is a bad business.' - Henry Ford Economy : Mines, generators, and hard-working drones are the backbone of your economy. Collect as much crystal, titanium, and energy as possible to keep your war machinery running. No war can be won without a functioning economy. Research : Better to have stronger weapons or faster production? Many fragile outposts or few defensible ones? Your research decisions should always adapt to your tactics. If you are too far behind technologically, you will be inevitable destroyed. Base building : Decide between strongly fortified bases or nomadic existence. Remember that a still standing target is an easy target to hit. Use the possibility to place your buildings freely in the world to occupy strategically useful points for you. Whoever has dominance over the map will win the battle in the long run. Story (Not included in Early Access): It is the year 2089, after the Redaxh visited the planet, society split into those who were friendly to the visitors and those who were not. The Zan split from the Andarers and began to despise everything that was foreign. After a successful assassination attempt on a Redaxh delegation, they declared war on the Old World. Devastating battles developed between the Andarians, Zan and the Redaxh, who each seek only the destruction of the other. Choose one of the three factions and fight for supremacy in story mode.

Name: Hogoworm Dungeon
About the game: Like the classic game of snake, guide your ever-growing worm through a series of puzzling levels to grab all the coins...with an adventure twist! Pick up magical scrolls to unlock colored energy barriers. But watch out for the red spiderbots! They only move when you move, so you'll need to use strategy and your own lengthening worm body to outwit and block them. Or you can just ram them with an energy sphere to blast them to bits. Either way, it will require a great deal of strategy and puzzle solving to make it down to the very lowest levels of the Hogoworm Dungeon! Features include: * Over 100 levels of increasing difficulty * Fluid animation * Steam achievements * Full support for either mouse/keyboard or game controller

Name: Sharon and the Last Garden
About the game: This game is a 3D puzzle action game. The main character, Sharon's mission is to cleanse the dirty world with the power of bacteria. - A unique ruined world Ghost animals are wandering around on the stage. Let's relieve them use the power of the remaining bacteria. - Small Low-Poly 3D Stages Take action in the 3D world and capture stage gimmicks. A small stage and gentle music combine to create a unique world view. - Lightweight and Fast Startup The auto-save and auto-load functions allow you to easily play this game. It also works very lightly as a 3D game. * If the load is heavy, you can make it lighter by changing the graphics settings.

Name: Comrade Quack
About the game: Comrade Quack is a fun, hybrid, third person tower defense game aimed at young adult audiences! You play as Comrade Quack defending the mother pond from a swarm of capitalist pigs. 3rd person shooting and strategic placement of turrets will keep the pond safe from being turned into a muddy sty. Strategy and comedy will collide in this wacky fast-paced game that's sure to keep you coming back for more. Your defenses are key to mollify the capitalist invasion. Use turrets to defend your turf. Your loyal quacklings to man your defenses. Your wings and your wits to be your Mother Pond's wingman. And above all else, dedicate your efforts...FOR THE MOTHER POND!

Name: Coding Learn
About the game: Attention! You should have basic programming experience in pascal, python or any other programming language to roughly understand the essence of what is happening here !!! Coding Learn is a game that will help you learn the c# programming language. You play as a robot whose main goal is to get to a mysterious castle. To accomplish this goal, you will write real code for c# using: A working compiler that runs your code and will be sure to tell you where your error is in the code if anything happens. Theory with small video clips before each task will help you get up to speed quickly and help you improve your code. Built-in hints for each task will help you solve the problem if you have unexpected difficulties with it. If you find it too easy, additional challenges for each task will challenge you. After completing the game, you'll explore 10 topics and go through over 60 problems, learning basic constructs like branching and more complex ones, recursion, and sorting. Start programming right now! Don't be afraid to make a mistake, the compiler will always help you find out where the error occurred.

Name: Outworld Patrol
About the game: Outworld Patrol is a side-scrolling action-shooting game inspired by on one of the first games I ever played on PC. Control a space rover as you jump to avoid obstacles on a horizontally scrolling landscape while shooting down alien ships that shoot missiles from above or charge you head on. The goal is to reach the planetary station in the shortest amount of time while taking minimal damage. Built in Unreal Engine, the initial goal of the project was for me to expand my knowledge in the engine and to recreate a beloved game motivated by my own nostalgia.

Name: The Scorchfarer
About the game: Welcome to the scarred kingdom. The story of The Scorchfarer is set on a post-apocalyptic high fantasy world. A cosmic event known as the 'fire rain' destroyed most life on the surface of the planet. It was soon discovered that the flames were so magically dense that it would take a millenia for them to die on their own. Both of the continents, Uzu and Zuhaar, joined forces to bring back balance to their world. A new breed of magus was born, the Terramagus, tasked with healing the world and to give every living creature hope for the future. Mikaela and Yukiharu, two novice Terramagi are about to set off into the heart of the continent after finishing their training. Their journey is about to become much more complicated than they could ever imagine as the secrets of their world slowly unravel. The first episode of The Scorchfarer (The Wanderer and the Anchor) contains the following features: 17 unique hand drawn characters 45 hand drawn backgrounds (+12 variations) 15 original songs 3 to 4 hours in length (first episode) A point & click system to learn more about the world by searching for clues A journal mode to learn more about the characters and places A sound test mode The Scorchfarer is an episodic visual novel, we expect to release an episode every 8~12 months. Visit our social media accounts for more information.

Name: EXTREME BIKE X
About the game: This easy-to-master motocross racing game is fun for everyone! Play with up to four players! Try out each bike's special abilities and take your favorite to the courses! Fulfill your need for speed on traditional tracks or tackle rugged courses brimming with nature! You can even create custom courses to make the races your own! Drift to take curves and turns like a pro! Nail jumps and mid-air tricks to show everyone what you've got! There's nothing like using your skills to beat your rivals with style. [Free Race] Set and keep trying to beat your record times on your favorite track! [Grand Prix] Select four tracks to create the ultimate course to battle on for the champion title! [Course Creator] Design your very own unique racetracks! Up to four players can join in the high-speed fun! Duke it out with friends and family and try to seize first place with flair!

Name: Vega
About the game: Vega is a fascinating pixel-art style quest. Young Mary - the protagonist of the game, running away from her pursuers, loses consciousness, and wakes up in a completely different place. Infinite, but as if asleep city, from which at first glance there is no way out. What to do? Who do I ask for help? Where to look for answers? And in the head as evil is one void. The girl does not remember anything about herself or her past. It remains only to go forward, but will she be able to finish her journey... Features: - pleasant graphics; - easy controls; - interesting gameplay; - light music; - unforgettable adventures;

ÂñÑËàáÊÉ° ÊÆ∫Ëàá‰∏çÊÆ∫ ÂñÑÊÉ°ÂÄºÂ∞áÊúÉÂèçÊò†‰Ω†ÁöÑÊâÄ‰ΩúÊâÄÁÇ∫, ÊÆ∫ÊàÆÂÄºÂ∞áÊúÉË®òÈåÑ‰Ω†Êâã‰∏äÊµÅÈÅéÁöÑÈÆÆË°Ä„ÄÇ‰∏âÊÄùËÄåË°å, ÊòØÊàëÁµ¶‰Ω†ÁöÑÂø†Âëä„ÄÇ ËÉΩÂäõÂüπËÇ≤ Êà∞ÁÑ°‰∏çÂãù ÈÄèÈÅéÊ∂àËÄóËÉΩÂäõÊûúÂØ¶ÊèêÂçáÂÄã‰∫∫ÈöäÂì°ÂØ¶Âäõ, Â∞áËÉΩÁÇ∫‰Ω†Êâ≠ËΩâÂ±ÄÂã¢„ÄÇ ‰∏çË¶ÅÂêùÂóá, Â•ΩÂ•ΩÂüπËÇ≤‰Ω†ÁöÑËßíËâ≤, ÊâìÈÄ†Âá∫Â±¨Êñº‰Ω†ÁöÑÂ§©ÂÖµÁ•ûÂ∞á„ÄÇ Á¥ÖÈ°èÁü•Â∑± Áµê‰º¥Ë°å ‰Ω†Â∞áÁµêË≠òÊúÄÂ§öÂÖ´‰Ωç‰∏âÂúãÊôÇ‰ª£ÁöÑÂ•≥ÊÄß, Ê†πÊìö‰Ω†ÁöÑË°®Áèæ, ÊàñËÄÖ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Â•πÂÄëÈÉΩÊòØ‰Ω†ÁöÑ?

Name: OverDrift Festival
About the game: OVERDRIFT FESTIVAL: DRIFT & AUTOSTYLING Welcome to OverDrift festival - a grand celebration of car culture and sports! Become a participant in drift racing competitions. Explore large territories and find iconic tracks and configs. Single and multiplayer challenges, tasks and events. Train with your friends online, compete with rivals from all over the world. Build your rating among drivers, earn fan likes. Improve your style and develop your skills. Japanese, American, German and Russian cars - gather a unique collection. Upgrade, tune and customize the cars. Be creative and self-actualize in creating exclusive liveries for your cars using the advanced styling system. Experience the emotions of a real driver from participating in races: spectators and fans on the tracks will appreciate your driving. Share your successes with friends and like-minded people. Make your dream come true and become the star of the festival! Intrigue and competition, joy and tears, drama and celebration at OverDrift festival! Join the community on Steam and subscribe to our publics on social networks for the latest information, screenshots and more before anyone else! GAME WORLD Dozens of kilometers of picturesque roads and tracks: public roads, mountain 'toge' serpentines and suburban highways, hypermarket parking and industrial zones, sports tracks and drift parks. Traffic on public roads. Iconic track configurations recognized by real professional drifters are integrated into the overall game world. The atmosphere of the sports tracks is created with the highest detail. Roads are perceived as real due to the environment and the terrain. Summer and winter, day and night, different weather conditions. FESTIVAL EVENTS Lots of events and tasks, drift races at the motorsports and styling festival. Make friends who are close in spirit to your car preferences. Host meetings and competitions in an open online lobby in a shared gaming world with a large number of participants from all over the world. Win the popularity of fans and spectators on the tracks, earn money for new cars and tuning, customize your car to accumulate likes. Create your own team and club, compete and advance to the top ranking of the festival drivers! CARS A large collection of legendary rear-wheel-drive cars that have earned the love of motorsport fans around the world. Models are made with high detail, salon and cockpit. An advanced system of styling and visual customization of cars has been developed in all aspects. All cars in this game are fictional. Any coincidence with real cars is an accident. PHYSICS Pure, clear and natural simulation of physical processes on our own architecture. Based on the many years of experience of our team, we have made great progress in improving physics and are proposing a next-gen project. Detailed tuning of the physical parameters of the car, variable parts increase in power and decrease in weight. Different weather conditions, air and asphalt temperatures affect engine performance and tire grip. The natural feeling of speed and lateral g-forces. BETA TESTING AND GAME IDEAS You can share your wishes and suggestions on Steam Community Hub by creating a separate topic. Submission of applications for participation in the beta testing of the project takes place in the Steam community. We will be glad to consider your candidacy. FEATURES: Real-time open world multiplayer Drift races on sports tracks and Free Style drift tours on public roads with traffic Huge game world with an area of ‚Äã‚Äãmore than 30 square kilometers and a length of roads over 120 kilometers Photorealistic nature, environment objects and characters in the game world are powered by the Unreal Engine Over 40 cars collection - the best representatives of the drift culture Juicy engine and exhaust sound systems with customization Events and tasks in the game world - a lifetime in the project Compete with your friends according to your rules, arrange massive events among teams and clubs Support for the latest graphics technologies including RTX ray tracing Convenient control on the keyboard and all types of gaming devices Physics of the car has been improved thoroughly Support for keyboard and gamepad control Support for all controllers, support for multiple input devices at the same time Support for all steering wheels with detailed feedback

Name: Champ's Nightmare
About the game: Champ's Nightmare is a horror audio game that is played entirely through sound with no visual input. The player must rely completely on their hearing to succeed. The objective of Champ's Nightmare is to avoid the monster, rescue the children, and escape the haunted cabin. The purpose of the game is to be fully accessible to visually impaired individuals. Champ's Nightmare is very narrative focused, and the controls only uses the arrow keys, escape key, and enter/return key. Headphones are strongly recommended. *Academic project*

Name: Rugby Union Team Manager 4
About the game: The fourth instalment of ‚ÄúThe Number 1 Rugby Union Management Game‚Äù. Rugby Union Team Manager 4 gives you full control of managing your own Rugby Union team. Training schedules, coaches, physios, scouting, finances, sponsors, facilities and more. MUCH MORE! Navigate your way through the biggest tournaments in Rugby, in both the Northern and Southern hemispheres, with over 10000 senior players to choose from! What's New? Training has had an over-haul, and now there is a Delegation screen where you can appoint coaches to positions. Team Selection screen is now drag and drop, and also displays all the players, along with their attributes with filters and options. There are now processing compartments when you press Advance, with compartments for results from different types of matches. There are now in-game editors for players and coaches, your edits can be made once the game is in progress and not just at the start of the game. In the match kick-offs now have the option of long, medium or short kick-offs. In the match there are now scrum move options, to be decided when the scrum is¬†awarded. In the match there are now line-out move options, to be decided when the line-out is awarded. Transfer Bids have been added in the Transfer screens, players in the final year of their contract receive Transfer Bids.¬† Once a Transfer Bid has been accepted, the player does the free transfer at the end of the current season. Vikings Tour. British & Irish Cats. Half time team talk. Playbook. You can now pre-select moves in a sequence, then select a playbook for each zone of the pitch for those moves to play out. 320 Clubs Including clubs from both the northern and southern hemispheres. Staffing and Facilities Control all staffing, including Assistants, Coaches, Doctors & Physios Upgrade facilities, including Stadium, Gym, Training Paddock, Track, Kicking Enclosure, Tactical Briefing Room, Academy Clubhouse, Alliance Clubhouse & Centre of Excellence Players Discover hidden talents among youth teams and work with Agents and Scouts to deliver the best players to your club. Featuring over 10000 senior players and 2000 colts players Full 2D and 3D match engines with real-time interaction with your team Game Database Editor Get closer to the simulation with the powerful customised game editor Tournaments and Competitions Work your way up the ladder and lead your team to the biggest tournaments in the world of rugby, with over 50 competitions included.

Name: Perseverance: Part 3
About the game: üßü‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüßü DOUBLE TROUBLE - Play as Karen or Jack üî™ TWO SIDES OF THE COIN - See the story from 2 vastly different perspectives üî™ CHOICE PARALYSIS - Over 200 decisions to make. No pressure. üî™ REAP WHAT YOU SOW - Every choice has its consequences. Will you be able to live with them? Perseverance: Part 3 is the latest and final episode of the drama/horror visual novel series where the only thing juicier than the gossip are the guts being spilled left and right. In Part 1 you play as Jack Cutter, a father who is struggling to keep his family together in the face of an otherworldly threat coming from the nearby military base. In Part 2 you control Karen, a calculated assassin on the hunt for a mysterious girl in the same remote town of Grey Ville. Finally, in Part 3 you will swap between both of the characters and help them form an unlikely alliance and face the overbearing danger as a team. Together, they will help the remaining survivors escape from the zombie invasion brought upon them by a mad scientist. It won‚Äôt be easy though, in their way stand bloodthirsty monsters, hostile military personnel, the cruel local sheriff, and the hardest obstacle of them all - the demons of their pasts. How will their story end? That‚Äôs entirely up to you. Will you make the right choices? During your playthrough, you‚Äôll have over 200 decisions to make and they will all influence how the plot progresses, so choose wisely. Will you help save humanity from the zombie outbreak or will you take the selfish path and save yourself and those dearest to you? No choice is a wrong choice but think through each and every step or you may just step off a cliff. The Perseverance series draws from stories like ‚ÄúNight of the Living Dead‚Äù, ‚Äú28 Days Later‚Äù, ‚ÄúBlindness‚Äù, ‚ÄúRevivals‚Äù and most of all ‚Äì ‚ÄúThe Walking Dead‚Äù. The main goal of the series is to show the drama of individuals in the face of terrifying events.

Name: Mage Lords of Brams
About the game: The city-fortress of Brams is renowned throughout the world as the home of the greatest wizards in existence: the Mage Lords. While inaccessible to most, the Mage Lords are now recruiting mages to join their ranks Joining Brams is not just about prestige. Within the walls of the city-fortress you will gain access to the greatest arcane library in the world, countless experimental laboratories, equipment and reagents, and training from the most knowledgeable and powerful mages in existence, all of whom expand their knowledge and power so that they may one day ascend beyond the mortal realm. Whether you are a seasoned archmage or sort of kind of a magic user on the side, all are welcomed to take the trials given to them by the remaining six Mage Lords, with those whose performance is found satisfactory being offered a seat among them. Mage Lords of Brams is a 'bullet heaven'/'reverse bullet hell' roguelite. Slaughter countless fantasy enemies with your powerful spells, powers and artifacts while gathering research scrolls to improve future runs inbetween levels. Early Access Features: 6 playable races (Human, Orc, High Elf, Wood Elf, Dark Elf, Vampire) with unique abilities 12 Armaments (weapons, spells and artifacts) 12 Classes (Berserker, Paladin, Valkyrie, War Wizard, Battlemage, Necromancer, Hierarch, Spirit Guide, Pyromancer, Illusionist, Enchanter and Lunar Knight) 18 passive skills Use the Library to improve 20 stats with scrolls dropped randomly by enemies Cards of various qualities show up every level-up, adding an additional layer of complexity: the one you want might not offer the best attribute boost. 2 Main Levels (Sewer and Estate) Planned features for final game: At least 12 playable races with unique abilities 6 Monster Races with unique attacks and abilities. At least 40 Armaments (weapons, spells, artifacts and powers) At least 40 classes with their own unique abilities Ultimate Spells 18 passive skills Genie market and trinket system allowing further customization every run Use the Library to improve 35+ stats with scrolls dropped randomly by enemies Cards of various qualities show up every level-up, adding an additional layer of complexity: the one you want might not offer the best attribute boost. 6 Main Levels (Sewer, Estate, Forest, Graveyard, Dungeon and Pyramid) as well as multiple secret levels. Content is planned to be added regularly until the game is released from Early Access.

Name: Survival Shot
About the game: SURVIVAL SHOT is dynamic VR shooter where your main goal is to survive alone during Zombie apocalypse in town. There are multiple kinds of weapons to help you break through weaves of undead. Would you be able to killed horror zombies when you are encircled by crowds of Zombies? Experience horror zombie survival like never before so dive into Zombie apocalypse, A fast-paced VR shooting arena so choose your gun as an undead survivor. Enjoy unique abilities, weapons, and challenges in high-paced action-packed thriller game. TOWN SURVIVAL:- Survival Shot is VR action game designed to put you Face to Face with all Zombie challenges. So compete waves survival, Buy guns, grenade to fight with boss zombies while collecting props like stones, tires, spare and knives to kill deadly zombies. BRIDGE SURVIVOR:- Are you ready to tackle all zombies that will appear on Bridge. This mode will be so challenging because you are stuck on bridge while Zombies are trying to attack you and you have to kill with best weapons. ZOMBIE RUN:- Zombie run is a VR Runner mode that will be more interesting for you because the primary concern is to get best weapons and kill the enemies that come your way, the challenge here is that most zombies tend to be very challenging to deal with, and their level of power does increase as you run further, so eliminate or dodge Zombies to survive. Features:- -Immersive Zombie Shooting Survival VR Gameplay -Single-Player Survival Gameplay -Get Your Weapons Like Modern Guns(Pistol, SMG, Shotgun, Assault Rifle And Much More) -Get Grenade, Swords Knives, And Spare To Kill Zombies -Play Zombie Town Survival, Bridge Survivor, and Zombie Run modes with challenging zombies -3 multiple environments with new challenges

Freeform game play with different starting money and map size.

Awesome 3D arts and animations.

DESCRIPTION Mei Mei is struggling in a toxic relationship. Her boyfriend is a controlling bastard who keeps her hidden from the outside world. She isn‚Äôt allowed to have friends; she isn‚Äôt allowed to speak with anyone; she isn‚Äôt allowed to be touched by anyone else except him‚Ä¶ She is kept at home in a rigid bubble like a fancy doll in a casket of glass, while he goes out and enjoys everything life has to offer. It isn‚Äôt fair for so many reasons! She is a young woman full of life who deserves better. So when her only friend and confidant ‚Äì her maid ‚Äì gives her a gift card to her favorite massage parlor, she jumps at the opportunity of pampering herself and doesn't ask many questions. Name: Brick Breaker
About the game: About Brick Breaker is based on the classic arcade brick breaking game, with new 3D effects and animations in a 2D view, it brings a unique experience to the player. How To Play Use the paddle to move left and right to make the ball bounce and break all the bricks in the level, collect coins and powerups that drop from certain bricks. Name: Superstar Streetz
About the game: Superstar Streetz is a multiplayer action-packed racing game. Name: Demolish & Build 3: Excavator Playground

And more‚Ä¶

Name: Heat Death
About the game: This ancient galaxy is under attack by the mysterious 'Apparitions'. They are huge interstellar monstrosities which threaten to consume the world. Your people will not surrender. Using a planetary warp-engine, you force your entire planet out of orbit, away from your familiar Sun, and into the darkness. Your enemy is out there - confront them head-on! Your planet is controlled using cards which you collect throughout the world. Build a deck of powerful weapons, shields, and other surprising and powerful effects. Ingenuity and resourcefulness will be the key to your victory! Rewrite your cards! Improve your deck even further by re-writing your cards! The game's unique crafting system is used to fuse cards into each other, allowing you to create unexpected synergies! For example, you can insert one card's text into a blank space on another, or you can carry a powerful bonus from one card onto another. In addition to cards, you can also upgrade your planet by finding unique tech which can provide additional synergy and firepower. The game world consists of procedurally generated maps of stars and clusters. Death is permanent ‚Äì you start from scratch each play session, to explore the countless interesting possibilities that exist in the game.

Name: Slime Village VR
About the game: Slime Village VR is a 3D sandbox in cute Lowpoly graphics, created especially for virtual reality glasses. The essence of the game is to search for various interactions between objects of the environment or just suffering from nonsense in the virtual world. For example, is it possible to chop down a tree with blaster shots, how high can a slime be thrown without consequences, or can I chop two trees at once with two axes. In this sandbox, you can: - Shoot a bow - Draw on any surface in the virtual world - Cut down trees - Break stones - Play basketball - Operate various mechanisms using levers and clamping plates (For example, open a cache, turn on a light or start a mill) - Admire slimes or increase their population by dividing into 2 parts, not without the use of physical force) - Or just build a tower of cubes And also find various Easter eggs not inherent in a magical village, for example, blasters or a space rocket. In the study of the virtual world, signs and signs will help you, and to move you can use the teleport.

Name: Gray
About the game: Gray is a first person, psychological survival horror set on the Moon. Playing as Dr. Frederick Gray, you must maintain and refill your depleting 02 and health to stay alive as you navigate Alpha Station and the secretive 'Extended Residency Section'. Use stealth to your advantage as you evade the horrors that await you. With no weapons available to you, you can run... hide in lockers... whatever you must to survive whilst being pursued by an ever raging fire and something much much worse. A story driven game pieced together through collectible voicemails, documents and video logs. The clues are all there as to what is going on, but will Dr. Gray's mental wellbeing hold out long enough to realize what is happening? Burn With Us As We Become One!

Name: Space Worthy
About the game: Atompunk science simulator Build spaceships, build electronic and other scifi machines. Live as a rogue space scientist. You were on the school trip to science camp planet, but unfortunetly, your ship had some strange issues and exploded apon arival, Now you are stranded on the planet and you have to use the science camp's educational courses in the way it was not intended to save your injured crewmates and escape the planet. Use reward parts to build electronic devices, so you can find rest of your crew and get back home. We will make you Space Worthy! Is the slogan of Science Camp in the story mode. You will be be taught how to build machines, how to craft basic items for survival, how to navigate in space, how to fly a spaceship and keep it operational. It will prepare you for what is next, the survival mod (In development). But for now, junkyard planet can be accessed after you finish the story,. You can salvage shipwrecks for parts and build whatever you want. After you successfully build your spaceship, you can challenge hostile ships in battle. waiting for you on planet's orbit.

Name: Suzu & Mari's Adventure 2 ~ lost colors and golden bells ~
About the game: ------------ About the game ------------ Control Suzu, the cat-eared girl, and work with her partner, Mari, the ghost cat, to reach the goal! Throw Mari to possess ghost in the stage. You can freely control the possessed ghost as a player character. The possessed ghost can be used as a scaffold, push switches, use its unique abilities, and more. Use them to your advantage to solve the stage's tricks and open the way to the goal. Try your best to clear all 60+ stages of the puzzle! ------------ Game Rules ------------ This game is an orthodox 2D action puzzle game that uses only the left/right move, jump, and possession buttons. The player controls Suzu, the player character, and uses the possession and gimmicks to her advantage. The goal of the game is to reach the goal point bell. ------------ Operation ------------ # Keyboard Arrow keys : Select menu / Move Space key : Jump Z key : Decide / Activate possession / Release possession X key : Cancel Esc : Pause # Gamepad Cross key : Select menu / Move 0 button : Decide / Jump 1 button : Cancel / Activate possession / Release possession 7 button : Pause * Gamepad key assignments can be changed from the options menu.

Name: She Who Rises
About the game: PRESENTATION She Who Rises is an old-school 2D RPG in the style of That Which Was Lost and Last Heroes. FEATURES Explore a vast world with varied locations and cultures. No town or dungeon looks the same in the world of She Who Rises Enjoy a powerful storyline about a girl who has to rise up to become a heroine The world holds secrets that you must discover through sidequests A huge world to explore at your own will and pace. The open world of She Who Rises is yours for the taking A Quest Journal to aid you in your journey Mouse Support SUMMARY Druna is an adventurous girl from Trunkhide. A peaceful tree village, the last village that can be called peaceful. She has lived her whole life training to be the villager's hunter, or so she believed. Soon, she will learn that her fate is something much more grandiose. As the object of the prophecy, it rests upon her shoulders the duty to fight and defeat the Conqueror, the Tyrant King who enslaved all the world under his reign of terror. So that she can have a normal life, the one she thought she would have, and so that others can enjoy peace, as she always has, she must take on her responsibilities. She is her, she who rises. MORE GAMES / / /

Name: The Conqueror of Battles
About the game: A new type of game In The Conqueror of Battles the goal is simple: eliminate the enemy characters and kill the boss, your victory will not depend on your agility or reflexes, but on the strategy you will adopt as well as your choices. You can invite your friends to fight together against other opponents. PREPARING FOR BATTLE Before starting the fight, you must select 3 characters who will fight for you, they differ by their spells, their cards and their attack range. These differences allow you to create many associations between the characters and define your gameplay. THE BATTLE The goal is to eliminate all the enemy characters and the boss. When all the enemy characters are dead, the boss appears, your goal is to deal him the most damage to kill him. THE ITEMS The items allow you to increase the power of your characters, you get them after the battles or against gold from the store. Gold is obtained after the battles as a reward. You are limited to 6 items per character. You can increase many characteristics and create your gameplay. You can also improve items to make them even more powerful.

Name: Dimension Dash

Name: MythBusters: The Game - Crazy Experiments Simulator

In MythBusters: The Game, you can: Solve puzzles in the Blueprint Zone to work out the mechanics of each myth Collect the materials for experiments and craft the equipment to use Bring the experiment to life by setting it up and testing it out Confirm or bust crazy real-life myths, or deem them plausible Build your audience to get as much popularity as you can! Fund and cut your episodes to grow the popularity of the show! First, manage your production budget and inventory. Once you conduct your experiments, play with the video editing module wisely, choosing the best bits to show. Make sure you have everything you need to impress the audience!

Name: Platonic

Name: Evelyn's Adventure
About the game: In order to save her mother, Evelyn, an 18-year-old girl, must disguise herself to hide her gender and be able to participate in the largest knights tournament in the world, which will decide Princess Saraya's fianc√©. Marrying her would allow her to have enough money to buy the medicine she needs to save her mother. But she is not strong enough to win, so accompanies Evelyn and Moon Mask, a mysterious thief, through an open world full of interesting locations, a variety of enemies and bosses, and mysteries and surprises. And with other girls throughout the world? ‚Ä¢ An open world third person 3D fantasy adventure RPG that takes you through a total of 12 biomes. ‚Ä¢ A final boss available from the beginning. Explore the world around you, level up, get stronger and when you think you can win the tournament, go to the coliseum and defeat the other participants. ‚Ä¢ Multiple protagonists. Switch characters between Evelyn and Moon Mask, and other characters you unlock in the future, master their different fighting styles and combine their skills to perform impressive combos. ‚Ä¢ Wide variety of bosses with different attacks and combat styles. Can you find and defeat them all? ‚Ä¢ Side missions that lead you to discover new stories and secrets of the world with good rewards. ‚Ä¢ Level-up system and shops where you can buy new magic and expertise skills that you can combine as you like to unleash powerful attacks. ‚Ä¢ Attractive female characters to meet and with whom you can choose to maintain a simple friendship or sexual relations. ‚Ä¢ Up to 2 different endings. Will you unlock the best one or settle for the normal one? * Customize Evelyn with a variety of skins for your clothes and weapons. ‚Ä¢ Collectibles scattered around the open world. Can you get all of them?

Name: Before the explosion
About the game: Space, emptiness and silence! Suddenly, a huge meteorite flies to the spacecraft and hits the engine, the spacecraft is damaged. You have only 3 minutes before the explosion to have time to leave the ship. the spaceship is about to explode, you need to make it, but the spaceship has a malfunction, now all the ship's defense is attacking you. Artificial intelligence will prevent you from leaving the spaceship. So what? Can you make it before the explosion? Haha, I think so! Beautiful graphics and energetic music will help you. The game is made in the platformer genre in 2.5D The goal of the game is very simple, you need to have time to leave the spaceship in less than 3 minutes, but the spaceship crashes and all its weapons will attack you, guns, turrets, homing missiles, gas and lightning. The game is made in beautiful raster graphics with a retro character, also in the game there is both 2D and 3D.

Name: SokoChess
About the game: What is SokoChess? SokoChess is a minimalistic puzzle game that combines Chess with the Sokoban block-pushing formula. The goal of each level is to push black pieces to predetermined positions while making sure they don't capture all your pieces. Push the black pieces The goal of each level is to push all the black pieces to their destination. Careful where you move The black pieces will only move if you give them an opportunity to capture one of your pieces. 70 levels Infinite undos Don't like a level you are playing? Skip it Puzzle elements you won't see in Chess Unique gameplay combining Chess and Sokoban /

Name: Bear and Breakfast
About the game: Join the official Bear and Breakfast Discord Server to chat with bear-minded individuals! Bear and Breakfast is a laid-back management adventure game where you play as a well-meaning bear trying to run a B+B in the woods. Hank and his friends find an abandoned shack and, equipped with their teenage ingenuity, turn it into a money-making bed and breakfast scheme for unsuspecting tourists. As your business expands so do the mysteries of the forest, and Hank soon finds himself uncovering a plot deeper than the wilderness itself. Build and personalize your inn with dozens of guest rooms, bathrooms, parlors, and entertainment. Each room can be individually customized completely from furniture to fixtures. Moving through the story-rich world of Bear and Breakfast will have you stumbling on dozens of interesting folks and weirdos, much like yourself. Not everyone is as helpful or as needy though. Are you bear enough to search deep within the forest and your soul to find the mysteries that lie within?

Name: Project Nautilus
About the game: Features of this Game Immersive Drone HUD Expansive World Narrative Rich Immersion Hello Drone Operator #4861! Hello, and welcome to the Isthmus Corporation Family. My name is PASSION and I will be your managerial AI, and I will help oversee your work. We would like to remind you everything that you are seeing is confidential and would like to remind you of the NDA you signed at this time. Now let us begin what is Project Nautilus. What to expect Project Nautilus is a first-person underwater exploration game where you, a menial drone operator, navigate through the depths as directed by your employer, the shady mega-corporation, Isthmus Corp. As Isthmus Corporation lays claim to a previously undiscovered cave system deep below the surface, you are assigned to survey the hidden caverns and uncover their secrets. You are entrusted to expand the company‚Äôs wireless network with the placing of signal beacons as you explore. Your ‚Äútrusty‚Äù managerial AI, PASSION, guides you to use your drone harpoon and drill to break open pieces of the environment and propel yourself further down into the depths below. As you explore the rich, biodiverse cave network you begin to discover remnants of a lost civilization and cultural artifacts including sculptures, etchings, and even old architecture. However, you must remember your one goal from Isthmus Corp., reach the bottom of this cave system and see what lies below.

Name: Sapper Robot

Just remember to keep an eye on the lighting. People's lives depend on your work! The age of robots and robotics is coming. Now people do not have to defuse explosives on their own. There are robots for this, without risking your life you need to control the robot and neutralize all levels. Be careful - the robot should not fall into the hands of bandits. Game Features: Tense atmosphere Beautiful Pixel Art Steam Achievements support Nice OST Challenging gameplay

Name: Fish the Detective!

You must go into the shops to trade with the townspeople, themselves math symbols, to find an item that gets you to the ocean. Cute n' funny dialogue About a half-hour of gameplay A cartoonish capturing of noir fiction WORKING ON INVENTORY SCREEN.

Name: Over the Counter
About the game: Make drugs, skirt the law and confront ethical dilemmas as you try to survive 20 years in the big pharmaceutical business. RESEARCH Employ scientists to invent disease treatments PRODUCE Optimise the factory line from warehouse to store SELL Analyse news events to forecast disease prevalence trends CAMPAIGN Launch disease awareness campaigns to increase drug demand LAWYER UP Hire lawyers to defend your unethical acts DECIDE Will you become corrupted by corporate greed?

Name: Stapel
About the game: The Stapel is a game of your reaction speed. You stack rectangular figures one on top of the other by timely fixation at the moment the figure passes over the previous one. If you do this a little later or earlier, part of the shape will be cut off to match the rest of the shapes. Management is simple, using the mouse. Your goal is to build a high tower of pieces, and your mistakes will bring the narrowing of the building closer and the end of the game. Good luck with your game.

Name: The Hunter's Journals - Wight Chapel Dreams
About the game: Revisit the case which made you a legend among your peers. YOU are a hunter; a man or woman of wealth and leisure who has turned their time to hunting the fiendish monsters that assail humanity. The first of a two-part story involving the cursed district of Wight Chapel. Delve back through your memories to relive the harrowing night of terror when you pitted yourself against The Crawling Horror. A choose your own adventure novel in which your choices and actions can lead you to glorious victory...or ignoble defeat. Explore an original story with three challenging game difficulties, unlock hidden lore to better understand the world you enter, and enjoy the artwork you discover in the gallery. This independently produced novel features a dark soundtrack (with optional atmospherics) by Cryo Chamber, as well as over 40 unique page images to unlock. The text of the game has also been recorded by a professional musician and story-teller, making it into an interactive audiobook. Combine your ancestral Heirlooms with the Traits system to customise your Hunter before taking on the horrors which await you. Wight Chapel Dreams includes a significant overhaul of the combat system which make it easier to identify your enemies and their unique abilities, while leaving more space on the page. It also includes an expanded voice cast, creating another classic Grindwheel Games experience to play and explore.

Name: Tame It!
About the game: For Lee it was supposed to be a short flight to the new job in the Bahamas. The weather was so lovely, and the pilot of the small plane was a hot girl named Tonya, who expressed a clear interest in Lee. Everything was going so great until the situation turned into a total disaster... And, suddenly, there‚Äôs no more sky, no plane, no hot pilot girl, just the deserted beach, pain, and thirst. Instead of a calm and cushy job in the hotel, Lee will have no other option than to learn how to survive. The so-called island paradise appears to be no safe place at all. It quickly turns out that Lee is not alone on the island. But he still needs to find out what the creatures (animals or beasts) that frighten him with scary sounds at night are. He would also have to find out ‚Äî what happened to Tonya, if she's still alive, and if there is any way to escape this strange island. Features A gripping story told without words: all the dialogues, interfaces, tasks are presented in the form of emojis, so you don't have to know any language to enjoy the game! However, if you find it difficult or are just fond of classic storytelling ‚Äî you can always switch the language to English. Explore the island and discover all its secrets; Survive in the wilderness, overcoming all the challenges; Meet the wild beauties and tame them! Day-night cycle: watch the beautiful skies and find the best viewpoint to enjoy magnificent sunrises and sunsets; Weather system: ranging from cloudless skies to terrible and devastating storms. Your character can change over time: get a tan, grow a beard that Robinson Crusoe would envy, then shave it off and totally change your hairstyle. Building your own shelter and crafting: you can craft anything from the most necessary surviving things to a spacious dwelling and delicious filling meals. Dialogue system: who said these wild women will speak your language? You will have to teach them how to communicate so they can understand you! Choosing a difficulty level: from a cakewalk to an unbearable grind. And that‚Äôs not all: Hidden stats, such as luck, hunting, and gathering skills; Wacky shrooms and berries; Lots of various mini-games. Let‚Äôs go fishin‚Äô! Exotic beauties with different personality traits you can build a relationship with; Animated erotic scenes; Many hot kinks, from the usual and beloved ones to some peculiar but sexy as well; Soft music that was created specifically for the game; Steam achievements, of course.

Name: Christmas Wonderland 5
About the game: Another Sensational Christmas Wonderland game for Everyone to Enjoy Christmas wouldn‚Äôt be Christmas without a new Christmas Wonderland! Christmas Wonderland 5 is crammed full of fabulous HOG scenes, lots of truly superb Mini Games and Puzzles for players of ALL ages and Santa‚Äôs Interactive Advent Calendar. Buy presents and get game Rewards and Achievements as you play along. See Bob‚Äôs Christmas Tree Farm, decorate the House, go Mall shopping, visit Mike and Mary‚Äôs Grandparents. Christmas Wonderland 5 really is the best Christmas game yet. Enjoy!! Find objects in beautiful Hidden Object Scenes along with a wide range of puzzle games.

Name: Sokobear: Summer

Bear doesn‚Äôt have a proper knife, so his trick is to roll the coconuts into the hole full of ice; it breaks open when falling in! Now, all Bear needs to do is find a way to roll those coconuts around the rocks, hay and ice! Breaking a coconut is no easy task. You need to roll it to an exact spot. It‚Äôs easy to get haystacks out of your way. Ice‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs another story. More coconuts means more fresh water, buuuuut it can make things a bit trickier. Solve the puzzle to enjoy fresh and delicious coconut water.

Name: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw
About the game: Lofi Waifu Jigsaw is puzzle game in which you have to combine pictures of sexy anime girls into one image using jigsaw pieces. Relaxing gameplay with beautiful artwork and original lofi music will help you calm down after a hard day at work or study. Many players enjoy this game for its simple gameplay but also for its relaxing atmosphere. Are you ready for some puzzling? 55 different levels, each with its own waifu image reward! Original lofi soundtrack Lots of different waifus, cute portraits and sexy nudes! Different sizes of the puzzle. Name: SYRAK: the War in the Middle-East
About the game: SYRAK: war in the Middle-East Card Strategy Game Disclaimer: the game main purpose is EDUCATIONAL, and it does NOT promote any political views or opinion. It is merely a game which lets you learn about a very complex modern conflict. Will you be able to control Syria and Iraq ? Can you manage your influence and finance in order to deploy your most powerful units, send Hackers and Spies? Battle the AI, local 2 players or online game with matchmaking . SYRAK is a card strategy game during the Syrian and Iraqi war SYRAK is a card-based strategy boardgame set during the most complex war in recent history of the Middle-East. Play as the Resistance Axis (Syria, Iran, Russia) or the Western Treaty Organization (USA, Israel and rebel groups) in local, solo or online games. Use powerful political, espionage and military Cards to outwit and overwhelm your opponent. * By playing cards and conquering cities, you will unlock Codex entries which will let you discover all the historical details and secrets of this conflict! Defend Damascus using the Syrian Arab Army units ! Try to conquer Ramadi and Erbil with various Espionage and Political cards ! The game lets you play Online against any other player around the world! Based on smart board game rules, you will use Initiative tokens to prepare your strategy, then deploy the cards in your possession in order to gain resources (Influence and Credits). While you gain influence around the map, against your opponent, conquering cities, you also have to develop your Strategic Alliances with the main regional actors of the conflict : Qatar, China, Turkey, the Kurds and the Arab League!

Name: The Cabin - Summer Vacation | Episode 1
About the game: Our project 'The Cabin' is a blend of traditional adult visual novel concepts, and horror elements. It is a story driven AVN complete with full 3D visuals where your choices matter, and includes some twists and turns you may not be expecting. Not all paths will lead to the kind of spicy content you may be expecting, but there will be plenty of chances for that as our protagonist searches for adventure to fill his last summer vacation with. In The Cabin, you begin your adventure as an 20 year old guy who's lamenting his last summer vacation before venturing into adulthood to start a career. Little does he know, when his plans get turned upside down and he finds himself out in the middle of the wilderness, this is likely to be more than he bargained for. Meet new characters, enkindle deeper relationships with existing characters, and most of all, keep them and yourself safe in this AVN where all choices matter. Episode 1 of The Cabin includes, but is not limited to: - Visiting various locales While there won't always be a choice of where you end up (especially in episode 1), we have a wide variety of different environments you will experience throughout the game, such as: relaxing at the nearby lake, visiting various stores and venues in town, or simply exploring the woods and finding hidden local gems. - Meeting 4 romanceable characters (With more to come!) We're taking more of a 'Quality over Quantity' approach to our characters, focusing on creating deeper more relatable personalities and quirks. No two characters should feel alike, and everyone will hopefully find someone, or a few someones to their liking. - 450+ HQ 3D rendered images These are just what are in the first episode, and we estimate each episode bringing an additional 300-500 renders, and more in the way of animations in the future. - Enjoy over 20,000 words of story Again, this is only the first episode, and future episodes should be of similar length. - Future episodes We estimate when the game is complete, it will be around 10-12 episodes. However as new scenes are created, and new branches emerge, this can be difficult to predict, and is subject to change. 10 episodes, around 4000-5000 renders and 200,000 words of story is likely to be the bare minimum. As this game is an adult visual novel, it includes 18+ sexual content. Though Episode 1 is a bit light as it introduces a lot of the characters, and brings the player into the game world, here is some of what you can expect to see as you continue to play, and more episodes are released: -Masturbation -Handjob -Blowjob -Vaginal sex -Anal sex -Exhibitionism -BDSM Please note, the vast majority of sexual content is avoidable, and interactions with the various characters are optional.

Name: Master of the Wizards
About the game: Choose your Wizard! Master of the Wizards is a party card game for 4 to 6 players in which you control a respectable wizard, you can choose one of our six characters to be your avatar. Conquer strange lands! Conquer Lands to gain influence throughout the realms and some extra power. Reach 20 points of influence to win the game. Cast powerful spells! Target other Wizards with your mighty Attack Spells. Be the last Wizard standing to win the game. Buff yourself! Increase your power with Buff Spells to get the upper hand. Curse your rivals! Cast Curse Spells upon rival Wizards to make their life miserable. And Chain their spells right back at them! Answer your enemies' attacks with Chain Spells to make them someone else's problem... But beware of being a Chain target yourself! Challenge your friends! Battle for the title of...
