Name: Winged Raider
About the game: Winged Raider is a 2D Shooter roguelike game where you navigate a castle that is crawling with goofy enemies and evil bosses. When you die you have to start back at the beginning, but the further you progress, the more story you unlock. Do you have what it takes to be the Winged Raider? Character Customization! -28 hats (some have multiple colors) -30 hairstyles in 8 colors -29 facial hairstyles in 8 colors -7 skin colors -12 body colors Guns and Wings! -9 guns (5 primary guns, 4 secondary guns) (You can carry one primary and one secondary gun) -6 wing abilities (different colored wings grant different abilities) Evil Enemies! -16 Different enemies -6 Bosses All enemy, gun, and wing stats are available to read about in the main menu! Check under the more button for item info (guns and wings) and enemy info. Info on bosses is unlocked under enemy info when they are defeated. The Kingdom of Daanco was saved thousands of years ago by a great hero. However, the Winged God stands to destroy everything. Turkzu has begun the attack of the Winged God and seeks to rule the Kingdom of Daanco under the Winged God. Save the Kingdom of Daanco from the curse of Turkzu! Your mission: -Infiltrate the Winged Castle -Defeat any who dare stand in your way -Eliminate Turkzu -Daanco is saved But one question still remains. . . Who is Turkzu?

Name: B.I.G
About the game: B.I.G is a puzzle game where you play characters depending on the colors to solve each puzzle to advance to the next level. There are four colors of red, green, purple and blue. Every color has its own special power red can destroy walls, blue can make you float in wind area's, green can spawn invisible floors and purple can move floors from one position to another position. Its up to you to solve the puzzles and finish the game in the least amount of time. Do you have what it takes to Finish the game? These game contains Levels - B.I.G contains 20 levels in the game. After every level the game difficulty increases and every level contains 3 health points if you die you will lose a health point and if you loose all the health points you will be respawned in the last checkpoint. Skins - In this game you can change the skin of the floor and B.I.G contains 5 types of skins which can be changed at any point of the game. Background - When we play games we sometimes wish we can change the background but you don't worry we can in B.I.G . The game contains 5 different types of background which you change whenever you need. This game may be updated and also we may increase the levels of the game for a better experience.

Name: Kanji RPG
About the game: Kanji RPG is a 2D RPG-lite game designed to help you learn how to read Japanese! Learn new Kanji and Kana by fighting enemies in different areas, and keep track of your progress in your handy-dandy stamp book. Every so often, you'll fight bosses, which are much stronger enemies that gatekeep your ability to progress onto other areas of the game. You can also customize your character's appearance, use weapons, and other items, whether by finding them in battle or purchasing them from the shop. Currently, only Grade 1 is accessible, but the end goal of this game is to provide a platform for learning all 2136 Jouyou Kanji in one game!

Name: Block'Em!
About the game: Block'Em! is an action-filled block-building party game for 2 to 4 players ! The controls are simple but the road to victory is complex. Be the first to reach the goal or be the last Blocky standing! Cute, addictive and fast paced party game to be enjoyed by 2-4 players. Outsmarting your opponent with cunning moves is easier said than done! An exciting mix of platform and puzzle! Find your way through the vibrant, chaotic arena. Watch out for the fireballs! Block‚ÄôEm brings out your competitive side. A sure way to make friendships stronger‚Ä¶ or not! Beat your opponents in a race to the finish or be the last Block to survive. Eat. Sleep. Block‚ÄôEm. Repeat.

Name: Timemelters
About the game: ' This wonderful weird thing has classic written all over it. ' - Eurogamer - ' It feels like you‚Äôre getting to play tactical general and frontline soldier all at once. ' - Edge Magazine - ' A unique interesting take! I can't really compare it to anything I've seen before! ' - SplatterCatGaming - --------------------------------- Missing a good old linear experience - that isn't repetitive - with a great storyline and innovative game mechanics? TimeMelters: Tome I - Witches and Pyres might be the game for you! You can start playing the Story Mode at 5pm (solo or with a friend) with some pizza and finish it around 3am, the perfect game night! And then there's another 10 hours of gameplay time with the Challenge Mode! Created by the co-designer of Sang-Froid: Tales of Werewolves , TimeMelters brings you to a mythical land of dreams and nightmares, where witch trials seem the only answer to the preternatural forces threatening the land. TimeMelters is a strategy-adventure game that features a unique game mechanic: Time Travel, which allows the players to go back in time and fight alongside themselves. You play as Teagan, a witch whose powers were just recently unleashed by an unwelcome guest. Now, you must venture forth in a desperate effort to cleanse the countryside from the seeping evil that is corrupting it. Something is rotten in the Kingdom of Hogendale. Creation is stricken. Trees and beasts sicken, wither and are reborn as shrieking, malevolent shades. The dead claw their way out of the poisoned earth to swarm mindlessly over the land. No living man or woman is safe from their dripping talons. Whole towns are brought to ruin. King Ionracas‚Äô dream of a lasting Pax Hogendala vanishes in an unnatural whirl of blood and misery. It must be the Witches! Who else could be responsible for this chaos? The King decrees their death by fire. And thus ‚Äî many an innocent woman is condemned to the sacred pyre. Now, the flames await you. --------------------------------- Features: Unique Time Shift game mechanic: rewind time and fight alongside yourself, not as an AI, but in a fully deterministic fashion. Plan out truly custom strategies and play to your own style! Hybrid Action-Strategy gameplay: Plan a strategy and execute it all in real time, across more than 20 distinct missions! Puzzle maps, boss fights, escort missions, survival, etc. -- each mission has distinct objectives and brings unique twists on the time travel mechanic! Co-op mode: Play the full campaign with a friend online! Startling storyline: Engaging campaign with all the twists, turns, nooks, crannies and what-the-bleep-just-happened moments you would -- and should -- expect from a story based on Time Travel! Challenge Mode : Test your brain power with 40 mind bending, 4D thinking challenges! Skill Tree: Choose how your spells upgrade -- yielding ever more powerful magic and intricate build choices! Original Soundtrack: Sumptuous, expansive soundtrack filled with epic moments (and a few earworms)! Why make this game? First and foremost, we try to make games that we ourselves want to play. As we get older. we don't always have a lot of free time in the day, and might only have 30 minutes here and there to game. So we wanted to create something that gets you into the action quick. No constant updates, long load times, or insane menu management. This game is for someone that wants strategy and intense action right away, coupled with a perk system to mix it up and a great storyline. What to expect: We are a small team of 3 people and it's taken us 5 years to make this game. While we are experienced and passionate developers in our own right, please don't expect AAA graphics. What you can expect though is some never before seen game mechanics and innovative systems. Because what TimeMelters may lack in cutting edge graphics, it makes up for with its unique design and captivating storytelling! Anyway, we hope you'll love TimeMelters as much as we do! Happy gaming!

About the game: ËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æ‰ª•90Âπ¥‰ª£‰∏úÊ¨ßÂÜÖÊàò‰∏∫È¢òÊùêÁöÑÂÉèÁ¥†È£éRPGÊ∏∏Êàè„ÄÇ Âú®ËøûÁªµ‰∏çÊñ≠ÁöÑÁÇÆÁÅ´Â£∞‰∏≠ÔºåÂ∞ëÂ•≥ÂºóÊ¥õÊãâÂπ≥ÈùôÁöÑÁîüÊ¥ªË¢´ÊâìÁ†¥ÔºåÂéüÊú¨ÂíåÂπ≥ÁöÑÂ∞èÈïáÈô∑ÂÖ•‰∫ÜÊàòÁÅ´‰πã‰∏≠„ÄÇ Âú®ÊÆãÈÖ∑ÁöÑÊàò‰∫â‰∏≠ÁîüÂ≠ò‰∏ãÂéªÔºå‰øùÊä§Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑÂÆ∂‰∫∫ÂíåÊúãÂèãÔºåÂπ∂Êè≠ÂºÄËóèÂú®Êàò‰∫âËÉåÂêéÁöÑÁúüÁõ∏ÂêßÔºÅ Ê∏∏ÊàèÁâπÊÄß ‰∏∞Êª°ÁöÑËßíËâ≤Â°ëÈÄ† ÊµìÂéöÁöÑÂÆóÊïôÂíåÂêéÁ§æÊ∞õÂõ¥ ÂÆóÊïôÂíåÈò∂Á∫ßÂÜ≤Á™ÅÊèèÂÜô ‰∏éNPC‰ª¨ËøõË°åËæ©ËÆ∫ ÂéüÂàõÁöÑÈü≥‰πê

Name: Brutal Rifters
About the game: ‚Ä¢ Campaign with 4 PVE scenarios for single player mode and LAN and online multiplayer mode for up to 4 players. ‚Ä¢ Tons of sub-bosses and bosses to fight that you can then unlock as playable characters. ‚Ä¢ 3D fantasy action game in third person. ‚Ä¢ PVP versus mode for up to 4 players on various interesting maps. ‚Ä¢ Frantic combat system with which you will not stop moving, use your skills strategically to surprise your friends and cause damage they will never forget. ‚Ä¢ +20 playable characters to unlock with unique abilities.

Name: Blue Jay Joyride
About the game: Blue Jay Joyride is a fast-paced 2D space shooter. Go through waves of enemies and fight progressively harder bosses. Collect one of the many unique powerups to give your ship a fighting chance in this intense game.

Name: Hentai Sexy Nurses
About the game: Hentai Sexy Nurses - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure! The plot of it is simple - you have to find pair cards on the level. After that you will see a stunning image of the nicest game girls. Besides, such games help you to develop your view memory. Do the levels, listen to good music, enjoy the images but the most important is getting pleasure! KEY FEATURES: -Steam Achievements. - Simple and clear gameplay. - Relaxing soundtrack. - Nice pictures. - An unforgettable experience.

Name: PegSoli+
About the game: Overview 'PegSoli+' is a game based on the rules of the classic board game Peg Solitaire (or Solo Noble), with some modifications. This game includes a 'Problems Mode' to solve preset problems, an 'Arcade Mode' to compete for speed with automatically generated problems, and an 'Edit Mode' to create original problems. Basic Rules A peg (piece) can be moved by jumping over one other adjacent peg, and the jumped over peg is removed from the board. No more than a peg can be jumped over, and no pegs can be moved if there is already a peg at the destination. The game is cleared when there is only one peg left on the board. Once you have one peg remaining, the problem is clear, but it can be completely cleared by meeting the following requirements. Solve problems within the specified number of steps: Steps are not counted if the same peg is moved consecutively. The key is to move as many consecutive pegs as possible. Centering: It is achieved when the last peg is placed in the center of the board. Some problems have a set stock of pegs. The stocks can be placed anywhere on the board, and all stocks must be used up to complete the problem. Board Types 'PegSoli+' has 3 types of boards. English style This board consists of 33 holes. Movement is limited to four directions: up, down, left, and right. French style This board consists of 37 holes. Movement is in 8 directions: up, down, left, right, and diagonally. Gunma style This board consists of 45 holes. On this board, only continuous moves can be made in diagonal directions. Game Modes 'PegSoli+' has 3 modes. Problems Mode This mode consists of 120 problems for each board type, for a total of 360 problems. Hints are provided for difficult problems, and hints can be unlocked by using hint points. Hint points are earned through game play. Arcade Mode This mode challenges you to see how many automatically generated problems you can solve in a given amount of time. Depending on your performance, you will earn hint points that can be used in the problems mode. Edit Mode This mode allows you to create your original board. The created problems can be output to a password and passed on to other players.

Name: EXOME
About the game: It's up to you and your team to find the missing research team. You will stumble upon challenges and unimaginable predators. Suit up and choose your gear because you are going to expend every last bullet in order to make it to the end. Explore the forest with your team. The smallest detail could be important to your mission. Fully cooperative with up to 4 players Single Player Mode Horde AI System Dynamic Difficulty Weapon and Equipment Progression Purchase weapons and equipment upgrades to increase your survivability. Unreal Engine 5 Open Non-linear World Character Customization In-game Feedback Form Use your equipment to give yourself the advantage against anything you may encounter.

Name: Board Game Engine
About the game: Normally the Editor would be paid, however since multiplayer has not been implemented we are allowing free access until we release the multiplayer update. You can buy the Editor early to support us, but note that it does not unlock additional features at this time. The Board Game Engine was built with game developers in mind as a tool for designing and prototyping your very own tabletop games with as much freedom as possible. Free to Play Play your favorite games or playtest upcoming titles for free! Pay only for the Editor. Game Editor A detailed game editor for creating your final prototypes. Everything you need to make your games can be found in the Game Editor, though dedicated editors are planned for all components. Modify core mechanics like players, hand limits, create a grid, or place snapping points for objects. Versioning Support All save types have versioning support, so you can switch between different versions of any type of save, even down to individual components. Update items of the same version in bulk inside the game editor. Deck Editor A dedicated deck editor, pulling together all saved cards into one simple UI for constructing decks. Steam Workshop Support Upload and download creations on the Steam Workshop. Free to play users can download from the Workshop too!

Name: Who Stole My Sheep?
About the game: In this turn-base 2D RPG style game, you find yourself venturing into different worlds where your abducted sheep might be located at. You meet different characters and each one of them has either something to say that guides you on your journey or prevent you from proceeding before you are declared the winner of your battle. FEATURES: -The Game is in the Arabic language only. . -Turn-base RPG fighting style. . -A story-rich world that is familiar to those following the Kafocado YouTube Channel. . The story revolves around a Shepard who had his sheep stolen from him by a mad king. It is unknown to him why his sheep is important for the king but our hero will do everything in his power to rescue his sheep for the mad king. To achieve that, he has to put up with different characters and their short comings, whether these characters will be helpful or just another block in the road.

Name: Greedy Corgi
About the game: A lovely puzzle game combining greedy snakes and pushing boxes. Move through the WSAD / direction key on the keyboard or the left rocker of the handle, and return through the R key on the keyboard or the B key on the handle. Lead the lovely corky to eat more meat! At the same time, it also has a level editor and creative workshop, which can create its own level.

Name: Godland : The Fire Quest
About the game: The world that once survived the apocalypse is now headed for its own destruction. The Great Empire of Drasko is driven by the desire to dominate ! The people of Gusandar decide to flee to an island, a promise of peace... Seen as cowards, and traitors, you are only running away from the inevitable, a fire that licks the flesh in its quest for destruction... Will you manage to save your people, to protect them from the fire ? Live as Ruban Gusandar, chief of the village of Gusandar, in this short Visual Novel and discover his history and the secrets that hide the island. Will war break out on the island of Gusandar ? Is peace impossible ? Discover the answer to all these questions by reading the short Visual Novel that is Godland: The Fire Quest Features: Short duration (1-1h30 minutes) Unique graphic style

Name: Extermination Cars Stadium
About the game: Has anyone offered you the opportunity to destroy cars and not suffer anything? In return you get money and fame. It sounds like something dirty in the middle, doesn't it? Well, that's the reality. Extermination Cars Stadium presents a new type of racing - competition game where only one can emerge victorious. It's like the tradition in Eastern Europe with the breaking of Easter eggs, only the strongest remains behind. Prepare your car in such a way that it can withstand the blows it will receive from others. Be very careful, you risk being called the king of the stadium if you continue at this rate. Sounds good, right? Then show everyone who the real destroyer is by eliminating them all and remain the winning driver until the last level! Game Features : - 4 destroyer cars - 10 levels - Timer - Level of destruction of the car

Name: Pumpkin Ripper
About the game: Welcome to Pumpkin Ripper, the dark fantasy survivor arena game that will keep you on the edge of your seat! In Pumpkin Ripper, you'll play as the fearsome pumpkin ripper, a powerful being armed with a deadly scythe. Your mission is to unleash your full potential and annihilate everything in your path. With fluid and dynamic combat mechanics, you'll be able to slice and dice your enemies with ease, racking up points as you progress through the game's arena system. As you hack and slash your way through wave after wave of enemies, you'll encounter larger and more formidable foes. But don't let that stop you - with the pumpkin ripper's deadly scythe, you have the power to defeat even the toughest of enemies. And with each attempt, you'll have the opportunity to increase your score and climb the leaderboards. So if you're ready to embrace your inner demon and wreak havoc on your enemies, look no further than Pumpkin Ripper. Play now and experience the thrill of the win!

Name: Project Valkyrie
About the game: Synopsis: - Trying to keep yourself alive in the coming apocalypse, you will find an underground refuge. Will it be safer than a scorched surface or will it become a nightmare trap? To know for sure, you'll have to go deeper through the darkness. Description 'Project Valkyrie' is a VR adventure in the genre of horror, which offers to go to a mysterious bunker, with entire blocks of rooms, dark corridors, and with its mysteries and secrets. Explore the underground complex of Newberry Hills and find out the reason for the disappearance of all inhabitants. Puzzles, a wrenching atmosphere and a frightening unknown behind each door. How far will you move in the gloom? Features: -Play time from 40 to 90 minutes -Interest puzzles -Ability to dive into the last moments of life of the inhabitants -Atmosphere holding in stress to the end

Name: TYPER GIRL
About the game: Whether they are ninjas, goblins, or dragons, they all try to uncover and capture the secrets of the zodiac girls. As the guardian of the goddess, you need to use the keyboard in her hand to defeat all the enemies in order to protect the girl! Game introduction Enemies will continue to appear from the right side of the screen, but there is a word above each enemy's head. You need to use the keyboard in your hand to enter the corresponding letter correctly to destroy the enemy and prevent them from reaching the far left of the screen. You'll encounter different types of enemies, including fast ninjas, goblins that summon little brothers, and slow-moving but healthy rock monsters. In order to stop them, you need to exert great typing skills. Game features ‚ù§ 12 zodiac girls with unique characteristics ‚ù§ 12 Guardian skins ‚ù§ Endless Challenge Mode brings more challenges ‚ù§ Global leaderboard

Name: Paranoya
About the game: In this game, you are a first person character that has been taken away from the earth and put into liminal and supernatural realms by demons because of your past sins. You must escape through 4 different dimensions and fight multiple creatures with different abilities and weapons to come back to earth. CAGE LEVEL In this level, you are put in a cage. There are security cameras watching you that are broadcasting it live on television, you are also being watched by other creatures. You must find hints to escape alive. PLAY ROOM LEVEL After escaping the cage, you find a way to a different dimension where whales want to eat you and everything looks un natural, there is water everywhere and more creatures that are also holding you back from escaping back to reality. PLAY GROUND LEVEL You're in the forest and find a castle, complete puzzles without dying to creatures to move on to the next. MANSION LEVEL This is the final level where you make it into the demons house, you must break in, steal his loot and defeat him to avenge your suffering.

Name: Mahjong Business Style
About the game: Become a business shark ‚Äì play Mahjong on the exchange! Complete more than 100 levels, earning points and countless trophies. Climb the ladder of success and Wall Street will bow to you! Each pack embodies a separate market ‚Äì from stocks to advanced technologies. The setup of each level contains a certain amount of gold pieces, which earn the player far more points than regular pieces. This adds variety to the game format and playing process. The levels are balanced by difficulty: there are classic levels and setups with wandering pieces, in which the arrangement of the the tokens changes with each new attempt.

Name: Pangaroids
About the game: Pangaroids is a small retro arcade shooter with simple mechanics, designed for the high score chaser in all of us. Endless survival score chasing gameplay inspired by some of our favourite arcade classics like Asteroids and Pang ! Command your ship to clear the screen of waves of enemy metal orbs. Easy to learn, simple controls to turn your ship, boost, and brake. Keyboard controls ‚Äì arrow keys for moving, spacebar for shooting. Your ship can‚Äôt stop. Turn it left and right and use your thrust and brake to keep from crashing into enemies. Shooting big orbs will cause them to split into smaller orbs. Sometimes they will release a power-up. Pick up a wide variety of awesome power-ups to help you survive longer. But beware bad power-ups that speed up enemies, enlarge or slow your ship down, annoyingly reverse your controls, or encase your ship in a block of ice... making survival even more challenging. So why pick up bad power-ups? They're worth a lot more points! No risk, no reward. Don't like a spawned power-up? Shoot it until it changes to something you like. That is, if you think you have enough time to pick it up... Get the high score. Enjoy the chip tunes.

Name: BLASTER
About the game: Let's play a new twin stick shooter arcade game called BLASTER. BLASTER features BLASTER 2 and BLASTER 3 you can play. Wanna arcade? Collect coins and use your blaster weapons and blaster character to blast enemies and level up in BLASTER. Collect coins and use your blaster weapons to blast enemies and level up in BLASTER 2. Collect coins and use your blaster weapons to kill enemies and level up and play multiplayer in BLASTER 3. Score a million points to win the BLASTER GAMES. Get a high score on the BLASTBOARD playing the BLASTER games. You can play BLASTER and BLASTER 2 in single player mode. And you can play BLASTER 3 in single player and multiplayer mode. Blast or be Blasted. Let's play BLASTER

Name: WUFO
About the game: Navigate your ship üõ∏ and recover Wi-Fi while dodging obstacles and fighting space enemies in the 4 worlds and 8 available bosses. You can also play together with a friend in 2D cooperative multiplayer! Help! They are chasing us. If our Wi-Fi is stolen, we are lost. I hope you arrive in time to help us, because I don't think they come in peace ... Seriously, we must not let our Wi-Fi be stolen...!

Name: Almost Home Now
About the game: A little girl finds herself having to walk home alone in the middle of the night. The empty roads seem a tad more ominous than usual. Control the protagonist in this 3rd-person fixed-camera horror game. Navigate your way through 4 distinct-themed areas as they get progressively more disturbing. At the same time, a stalker inches closer and closer. Quiet residential streets... Eerie park paths... Creepy woods trail... And just outside of the home, where things take an unexpected turn... Can you make sure the girl gets home safe and sound?

Name: TEST RE
About the game: ‚ñ†Game Overview Set in a spooky lodge or laboratory. And use pistols, rifles, rocket launchers and other weapons to fight monsters and escape. This is a horror adventure FPS (first person perspective). ‚ñ†History Two years ago, a large-scale bio-terrorist attack took place in a certain city. This bio-terrorism killed more than 170,000 people The whole world was shocked by the world's worst bio-terrorist attack... The protagonist miraculously survived the bio-terrorist attack. He started to search for the truth about bioterrorism under the status of a journalist, based on his experience... Two years passed. Then one day he received a phone call. The call was to reveal the virus used in the bioterrorist attack two years ago... Suspicious, the protagonist goes to the abandoned house where he is asked to go... ‚ñ†Full support of 4K HDR QuietMansion Remake features full support of 4K HDR Compatibility with 16bit HDR implements a gorgeous presentation that goes beyond usual HDR Enjoy a different dimension of graphics! ‚ñ†An evolved image production Thanks to the success of crowd funding the developer was able to obtain a high-end PC 'Heavy productions and effects that could not be used until now' can now be used freely An overwhelming image beauty has been realised ‚ñ†An evolved sound system Real Sound Effect(RSE) was experimentally introduced to previous works, and received extraordinarily high ratings Now it's evolved to Enhance Real Sound Effect(ERSE) Horror productions that featured 3D Space Audio were able to be transformed into completely new horror experiences Title TEST RE Genre First-Person Horror Adventure Age Target None (in the future CERO rating planned) Distribution Permission Full (This game may be streamed individually or commercially) Translator:Richard Lenerz Special Thanks:Tobias Nitsch & Steve Russell

Name: ÈÅä„Çì„ÅßÂ∞ÜÊ£ã„ÅåÂº∑„Åè„Å™„ÇãÔºÅ ÈäÄÊòüÂ∞ÜÊ£ãDX2
About the game: Shogi software with functions that even beginners can enjoy. In addition to playing games, there is a 'shogi class' where you can learn basic rules. With 3 million joseki, 17 levels of difficulty setting, and various other functions, you can enjoy shogi from beginners to advanced players. [There are Various Game Modes] „Éª 'Normal game' where you can freely enjoy shogi such as playing against a computer, 2P game, checking the game record, and inputting the game record. „Éª 'Rating Game' to understand Your Own Ability. „ÄÄYou can understand your strength by playing against a computer whose level is close to your strength. „Éª 'Shogi Dojo' to Play Against 9 Characters. „ÄÄCharacters with unique fighting styles will appear. „Éª 'Shogi class' where you can learn the basics of shogi and tesuji problems. „ÄÄCharacters from the Shogi Dojo will appear and explain about Shogi. „Éª 'Tsume shogi' that can challenge a total of 150 questions. „ÄÄIt contains a wide range of questions, from simple to difficult. „Éª 'Enclosure / Tactical Encyclopedia' where you can see the explanation of the enclosure / tactics „ÄÄYou can learn about enclosures and strategies. [Abundant Beginner Support Functions] „Éª A wide range of difficulty adjustments in 17 levels from 'Beginner' to '4th dan'! „ÄÄThe strength of '15th grade' and '13th grade' is suitable for beginners' practice. „Éª 'Two-choice hint' to choose the correct answer from two choices! „Éª'The dominant display of pieces' that displays the effect range of pieces in an easy-to-understand color-coded shogi board! „Éª 'Analysis function' to look back on what went wrong! „Éª 'Introductory piece' that shows how to move pieces at a glance! „Éª Display the 'enclosure / tactics' used during the game! [There are various other functions] „Éª 'Handicap' that adjusts the difference in ability by changing the number of pieces. „Éª 'Position graph' that displays the condition of the board in an easy-to-understand manner. „Éª 'Check warning / Check effect' to display the opponent's check. „Éª 'Use of joseki' with 3 million hands recorded. „Éª 'Movement range display of pieces' that makes it easy to understand where to move. „Éª 'Display of steps and streaks' that makes it easy to understand the position of the squares. „Éª 'Save Kifu' that can save up to 100 game results. „Éª 'Kifu Playback' that allows you to check the saved game record. „Éª 'Kifu Input' that allows you to freely enter a game record. „Éª 'Reading voice' that informs the movement of the piece by voice. etc. There are many other useful features. Have fun learning and become stronger!

Name: Adarin Farm
About the game: Grow fantasy crops & harvest fruits Plant seeds and automatically harvest fruits from fantasy crops. Each seed has a randomized effect that will have an impact on the medium term for your farm. Quantity of fruits you can harvest is highly dependent of the type of seed, effects you unlocked on your fields, skills you have taken. Loot to improve your farm While harvesting or completing requests, you have access to a large variety of randomized rarity fertilizers that you will use on your fields. These fertilizers will give you major bonuses. Complete requests Sell your fruits for earning money and possibly the highly sought-after runes (which are used for unlocking permanent skill effects). Unlock new skills Discover and unlock skills to have a permanent effects on all your future runs. Choose your seed effects Choose among a selection of randomized seed effects to tailor your run. Deal with Curses and Spells Evil Rainbow Slime Gang is casting a random curse on you every 3 days. Choose the less impactful one to avoid ending your run prematurely!

Name: VR AirHockey / VR „Ç®„Ç¢„Éõ„ÉÉ„Ç±„Éº
About the game: You can enjoy playing air hockey on a fantastic field with a huge size that you cannot experience in reality. Various levels of CPUs are available for both children and adults.

Name: Sex Adventures - Futanari BDSM
About the game: A click-through visual novel about a lesbian couple who goes to a secret BDSM club. They must be prepared for whatever the dominatrix tells them to do. Visual Novel Description Mindy and Shay, a cute lesbian couple, are going through a difficult time, arguing almost every other day. Not even their sex life is the same as in the beginning, each of them wanting different things. After a series of discussions and compromises, they decide to try something completely new, to spice things up. Leaving jealousy aside, they go to a secret BDSM club for the first time. Once they arrive there, the dominatrix warns them that they will be filmed and that there are a series of rules to be followed. Will the girls be intrigued or intimidated by what they will be told to do? Will their relationship recover once they experience the most twisted sexual fantasies? Let‚Äôs find out together.

Name: Collapse Relapse
About the game: You have 60 seconds to explore a collapsing cave before time resets, and then you'll lose everything but your map and one item. In order to escape, you'll have to plan your route and uncover secrets. Use items to find other items and get to new places in this metroidvania with clay graphics! Extra modes and challenges -- Unlockables flip the game on its head! Hidden codes uncover unique gameplay challenges! Randomizer -- The customizable randomizer mode lets you play with the item layout entirely rearranged. The game's logic will ensure each game is possible to complete in respect to both item order and time. The logic can be set to normal, difficult, or off and you can even entirely turn the game's clock off as well. Sequence breaking -- Don't like playing in the dev-intended order? You can abuse the game's design to get items early, or not at all! Go for low%! Speedrun timekeeping -- Turn on a speedrun timer to place in the corner; best times are kept for any%, 100%, and low% for each different mode. Each random seed you generate also has its own best times saved and they are easily selectable to be played again.

Name: My Bunny Girl
About the game: This is a story about how a lonely guy finds his girlfriend where he did not expect to see her. One day he finds an amulet and puts it on his pet. His rabbit is transformed into a beautiful girl. He is embarrassed and does not even know what to say, but for the beauty girl he is not a stranger, because he is her master! In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures. FEATURES ‚ùÄ Beautiful artwork ‚ùÄ Animation scenes ‚ùÄ Relaxing music ‚ùÄ CG Gallery Mode ‚ùÄ Puzzle game

Name: Word Game
About the game: Word game is literally a game of words. Words are not only composing narratives and interfaces, but also representing objects, characters and scenes. Player controls 'I' to challenge puzzles composed of words. When 'I' appears a secret room, in-game narrative clearly tells 'I' that 'there is no door‚Äù. However, in the world of word game, ‚ÄúI' can walk through the 'door‚Äù because there is a ‚Äúdoor‚Äù. ‚ÄúI' should find clues between lines, delete words to change the meaning of sentences, or shift words to rewrite facts. ‚ÄúI‚Äù must be wise and brave enough complete the mission of words. May the best 'I‚Äù win!

Name: A toad well travelled
About the game: 'A toad well travelled' is a short, but challenging, side-scrolling platformer about a young toad that sets off to explore the world outside the safety of his pond. Along the way, you as the player, will guide the inquisitive toad through diverse, dangerous environments filled with not-so-friendly creatures. Features: * A story book which gives the player a chapter by chapter description of the toad's journey but more importantly, also gives a brief insight into the challenges that lay ahead. * Stylized, realistic-looking environments and creatures. * Three difficulty levels ranging from 'egg' for the younger players, 'tadpole' and full-grown 'toad' for those wanting a bit more of a challenge. * Experience the unique, ambient sounds of the Australian bush at night, featuring kookaburras and lyrebirds. Note: This game is best played on 1920 x 1080 resolution at 100% scale.

Name: Drone Wars
About the game: Our goal with drone wars is it to create a fun, simple, but unique and fair multiplayer experience. What you can expect from this game: Controlling the drone is simple and easy, so no flight training needed, just jump right in and have fun! No one-shot weapons. Under normal circumstances there are no one-shot weapons, so you always have the chance to put up a fight if you get attacked from behind. The game currently supports 7 different game modes, but there will probably be more in the future. Drone: Team deathmatch Drones vs Humans: Team deathmatch Drones vs Humans: Wipeout - Survive as human until a rescue force arrives, or as a drone try to kill all the remaining humans before the timer runs out. Every dying human ends up as a drone. Drone: Arena - Last drone flying Drone: Deathmatch Drone: Capture Points - Capture and defend the capture-points Human: Team Deathmatch After each game mode, you will have the option to vote for the next game mode (can be disabled by server admins) Your feedback is important to us, so we can let the community help improve our games. We welcome you to share your thoughts with us via the steam forums or discord, and the development surveys we host.

Name: Wizard Girl Anzu
About the game: ‚ÄªAll characters in this game are 18 or older. ‚ñ†Plot‚ñ† An exciting story about a wizard girl who fights evil...? Scratch that, it's actually a story about one of the mob characters from this Anime series. One day, this mob character develops personality and suddenly realizes everyone around him is an 'NPC', characters without any kind of willpower. Sick of the same old reactions he gets from these NPCs, the main character... ‚ñ†Game system‚ñ† - No tedious battles, just find NPCs that trigger events! - Collect the magic pieces scattered around the world to advance the story. This will give you more choices and expand the map. - Because this is a world of an Anime series, all characters are NPCs that only say their lines. - They have no willpower, so you can do anything to them and they won't get bad. - School, business district, enemy's base... Find all kinds of NPCs in various maps. ‚ñ†Other features‚ñ† - Hide text window - Skip messages - Control guide on/off

Name: The Inn Between: Prologue
About the game: Discover a dark new fantasy world in The Inn Between , a turn-based, tactical RPG with strong elements of exploration and many opportunities to forge your own path. The Prologue Chapter is a roughly 8 hour experience crafted to be the launching point of The Inn Between series. The Prologue Chapter is a standalone experience and progress will not carry over to future chapters in the series, however it will give you an idea as to what future chapters can be. Which is why we have decided to release this chapter for free. We want to start to build a community around this game so feel free to join the game‚Äôs discord to provide us with useful feedback(Linked in the sidebar). The Prologue Chapter is a great introduction into the world and lore we are building and you will be able to become acquainted with some characters who will be present in The Between . We look forward to working with the community as we move forward with development of Chapter One . At its core, ' The Inn Between ' is a uniquely styled role-playing game with turn-based combat and rich storytelling. Build each party member however you like, solve puzzles, craft items, and slash your way through a variety of enemies. There are lots of secrets to find in The Between so be sure to check every nook and cranny. The world is filled with new things to discover and often times branching off the main path will have you finding new items, characters, quests and more! Enjoy a large selection of tactics style combat encounters that are sprinkled throughout the game world. Every turn matters as you attack, reposition and heal your squad, leveraging your own build style against a variety of encounters. Swords, shields, guns, wands and more are at your disposal, as well as a fair selection of abilities for each type of weapon. Use these tools and more to manage each conflict by dealing damage directly or by trapping the battlefield with hazardous terrain. Follow the story of Cryptor, who has woken up in a world somewhere between life and death. Meet new party members and slowly unravel the secrets of The Between, a world where lost souls arrive without much guidance, left to discover their own true selves.

Name: All Alone with Mannie
About the game: You take the role of a child in their bedroom. where an emergency recorded message plays in the middle of the night to warn you that something sinister is coming and to avoid being caught by any means necessary. The game has a unique mechanic where every time the character blinks, Mannie moves around the room. You can look under the bed or ceiling to see if Mannie is there. You can also hide underneath the covers if she enters the room. Watch your surroundings. Use flashlight and blankets to defend yourself. This game was created using the Pixel Game Maker MV engine.

Name: Baron of Blood
About the game: Baron of Blood is a pixel art platformer game in which you play a guy who has to fight through exciting levels and defeat different monsters. Collect coins to buy powerful items from a merchant that will help you in your adventure. The game starts in a gloomy environment where you have to deal with different monsters and ghouls. Equipped with a simple axe you fight your way through the different levels. The game is reminiscent of 2D platformers from the 90s peppered with fearsome music and sound effects. Plot: The game tells the story of a baron who was once powerful but was unjustly banished from the kingdom. He was betrayed by a dark magician who sought the great, magical ore Idirium. The baron possessed the largest Idirium deposits on his lands, but the baron is now banished and the ore for the dark magician is within reach. But the baron swore revenge and is now fighting his way back to clear his name and fight the dark magician.

Name: Geometric Hell
About the game: Geometric Hell is an arcade bullet-hell shooter with minimalistic graphics. Survive waves of aggressive geometric shapes and upgrade to keep up with the progressive increase in difficulty. Defeating bosses rewards you with special upgrades. Many deaths are expected before you get a chance to fight the final boss. Between attempts, you should keep track of your achievements as they reward you with points used for permanent upgrades. Player The player can move around withing the play area and shoot enemies. The player can also dash, dashing makes the player temporarily invulnerable to most damage in the game, while also dealing massive damage to any enemies you collide with. Other ways of dealing damage is unlocked by defeating bosses. Enemies and Upgrades There is currently 6 different types of shapes, each shape has 4 variants: Normal, Elite, Miniboss and Boss. However, the final boss is unique. Defeating enemies rewards you with points used to upgrade at any time, while attempting the game. While upgrading you get 3 alternatives to spend your points on, or you could spend a small amount to refresh. Each unique upgrade can be upgraded 9 times and all prices increase every time you buy an upgrade. Additionally, bosses awards special upgrades, which then will be added to the upgrade system where they can be upgraded further. They can also be upgraded if it's rewarded multiple times from defeating bosses. Achievements 54 achievement points are currently available, and can be freely added to and removed from upgrades in the achievement menu. This progress is permanent and increases your chances of beating the game.

Name: Crystal Winter
About the game: This is a short (3-4 hours long) Japanese-style kinetic visual novel about Christmas. You'll meet two cute girls who won't let you spend Christmas alone! Story This Christmas night was supposed to be special for Naoki. He decided to surprise his girlfriend Miyuki - he bought a bouquet of flowers and booked a restaurant. But when he went to her office, he saw Miyuki cheating on him with another guy. He immediately ran out of the office in anger. In Central Park, he meets Yume, a young guitarist who, like him, has no one to spend Christmas with. Her cheerfulness distracts Naoki for a while. But running away from the problem is not the solution. Romantic Christmas story, with 2 adorable girls with cute, awkward situations, and more than 12 CG, 6 tracks, and 5 backgrounds! Yume Date of birth: January 10, 16 years old.Fun-loving, childishly open-minded girl. Originally from a county town, she moved to Tokyo to escape her parents' custody. She quarreled with her father because of her passion for guitar. He wanted her to learn guitar lessons when she was a child, but she refused and suddenly wanted to return at the age of 16 (which is too late by her father's standards). Admires Naoki. Miyuki Date of birth: August 26, 23 years old.Naoki's childhood friend. Had known him since he was 11. Started dating him in high school. She is the opposite of Yume. She becomes shy when she stays alone with Naoki but usually, she's quite energetic. She feels embarrassed when Naoki shows his care in public. Miyuki is worried that she is not 'interesting' enough for Naoki, and she is jealous that Yume and Naoki have a lot in common.

Name: One Last Memory - Reimagined
About the game: One Last Memory is an emotional story-driven 3rd person exploration game that heavily utilizes adventure game features. You play as an unknown man who re-discovers his own past and lost memories on his journey through the beautiful and diverse nature. On your way you will not only explore the intense and sad background story of the protagonist but also fight against his literally materialized fears. A great combination of a relaxing exploration and an exciting adventure game filled with joyful, sad and breathtaking moments awaits you. What should expect to find in the game? A heart-breaking story A Journey through all 4 seasons A ton of secret locations that only a careful explorer will discover Collect life energy to fight against your materialized fears Surreal elements like giant toys that are references to the story are hidden along the way A giant underground cave system full of surprises and little environmental riddles Many small events, like an exciting boat ride or a maze build out of elevators are waiting for you A story filled with twists and emotions And a lot more‚Ä¶

Name: Project:Sphere
About the game: Arcade game in 3D, with frenetic action, in which you will have several modes to test your skills. Fight to survive or kill everything you can in this game full of spheres. You will have several game modes in which you will have to survive, kill and catch the gems that will be on the map. In each game mode, the map will not always look the same, it will always look different, and in some game modes the map will be generated randomly so that your games will never be the same, both visually and in their structures. You can change the skin of your sphere as you progress through the game modes, so you can define your style and fight as you like. In each game mode you will have a type of score that you will be able to improve, with this you will be able to surpass your own marks, as well as to help you in your personalization. Three different game modes Each game mode has different enemies to defeat. One game mode has 3 different locations, each with different enemies. More than 35 Skins to unlock, which you will see in each game mode. High scores, so you can try to beat your own record. compete against the world to get the best score. Different ways to live your experience in each game mode. A game mode with a randomly generated map. A game mode that will always have a different visual design. A game mode, in which the aesthetics of colors will change, just like the enemies! Fight in each game mode, beat your own scores, get all the skins!

Name: War of Kings
About the game: You have to participate in the war for independence. Faithful soldiers who are called for magical resources help you with this. Some units have increased health, some attack from afar. Magic will also help in the confrontation. Slowdowns, magical explosions, fireballs... all this will help you fight the invaders. War of Kings is a 2D auto battler in which you have to win the battle against evil monsters coming from all sides in an endless stream. Discover the talents of the commander of a huge fantasy army and lead it to light and peace! -Dynamic gameplay -Dangerous enemies -Interesting gameplay

Name: Self gunsbase
About the game: The Anomalous Locations Research Company sent you a letter to visit the Anomalous Forest and find a special radiation stone. However, you meet green creations and unravel the long-term secret of the company. Unlock new endings and variations of the storyline. Destroy the green creatures of Satanella. Solve puzzles and don't stand in one place - danger is absolutely everywhere. Follow your own path, do not listen to anyone - otherwise he will lead you to a dead end...

Name: City Bus Driver Simulator
About the game: Next station: Green st. Dear passengers, please take the seats provided. Does that sound familiar? Try what it's like to be a real bus driver. In this bus simulator, your mission is to be the best bus driver simulator and to be on time each time. Even if you will have a route to drive, we guarantee that it will not be boring. Every day you will meet all kinds of passengers that you have to pick up from one station and take them to other stations. Are you ready for such challenges? Put on your uniform, start the engine and start your career right now! Game features : - 3 types of buses - 10 levels - GPS Assistant

Name: Sail
About the game: Open world VR Pirate Game UNLEASH your inner Pirate in SAIL the open world VR Pirate game. Earn your Pirate reputation through EPIC voyages where you'll test yourself by collecting as much treasure as possible and bringing it back safely to your Pirate hideout. BUT BE WARNED . . . You're not the only Pirate seeking fortune on the seas. Fight off Pirate enemies on land with your Pirate weapon of choice - OR - Battle them on the seas using your ship's cannons and voice commands. Put your plunder to good use and use your riches to equip yourself with the best weapons and ships a Pirate could ask for. With an Open World filled with Treasure, Mysterious Islands and limitless possibilities there's only one question left to ask... Arrrrgh you ready to set SAIL ??? PLEASE NOTE: SAIL is in Early Access and is being tested and perfected. BIG THINGS ARE COMING and we are working hard to release a version of multiplayer in 2023. We appreciate any and all feedback. Download SAIL and join us and our awesome community as we work to create the best VR pirate game possible! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING SAIL!!!

Name: FALL IN LOVE2
About the game: Introduction The main goal of the game is to find all the differences between the 2 illustrations. When you find them, you only need to use the mouse to click to eliminate the differences. When all are found, you can browse to the complete illustration content and unlock it into your own book. When you unlock all the book content, you can clear the level! Illustration introduction The illustrations used in the game are all beautiful anime girls with their own characteristics, including a pure female nurse, a sexy car model, a seductive succubus, a mature young woman... There are as many as 31 levels in the game. Come and experience it!

Name: Conditus
About the game: Have you ever got into an argument with your friends on who would be the best ninja, of course you have! In this game you can set an end to that argument and show your friends the sword in a mystic temple. You can either go out with full force and kill everyone in your path or you can go with stealth-mode and take out your enemies quieter and smoother. Play up to 10 players in 2 teams (Team Red and Team Blue). Currently only in one gamemode! Win matches to level up and unlock better movements and quicker attacks to become a better ninja. Combine your own combo set to achieve a unique attackstyle. The waiting time for matchmaking can be very long if you try to find random people, so I recommend playing with your friends.

Name: Astrocat: Milky Way Journey
About the game: Astrocats: Milky Way Journey is a 2d puzzle in which you need to help the novice astrocat Skylar, from the planet Wool, from the distant Tek-1 Galaxy, she was traveling through space on a mission when she spotted a galaxy that looked like a milky way, curious, decided to investigate and saw that unfortunately there was no milk, but a lot of planets and peculiar objects to photograph as she quickly passed through the Milky Way. As her small camera can't capture the entire galaxy, she took a picture of some planets in that galaxy and decided to put them together on her tablet to send to her planet's scientists, as she continued on her way to her mission. Skylar is excellent at taking pictures, but terrible at montages, and she also didn't memorize the order of planets and objects very well, so whether you do the montages in the right order of the planets or not, Skylar thinks it's important to show scientists what you've seen. along the way, so she counts on you to finish editing the photos! Resources: 50 levels. Solve the levels as you wish: what matters is using all the pieces! No keyboards or joysticks! You just need the mouse! Curiosities and information about all the pieces present in the game. Hand-drawn parts. Original and relaxing music. Also Recommended For You /

Name: Fight For It
About the game: Fight For It! is a turn-based, rogue-like adventure. Create an adventuring group and walk through random generated zones full of enemies , awesome encounter and lots of loot . Includes: ‚Ä¢ 8 Unique Character ‚Ä¢ 4 Maps ‚Ä¢ 20+ Upgrades ‚Ä¢ 60+ Enemies ‚Ä¢ 80+ Encounter ‚Ä¢ 100+ Items ... future updates will increase the content further. Features: ‚Ä¢ Roll lots of dice to test your skills ‚Ä¢ 5 different difficulties ‚Ä¢ Write a different story with every play ‚Ä¢ Dynamic enemy strength by your level & infinite game length for infinite runs! ‚Ä¢ Dynamic ability learning through usage, or upgrade your favorite abilities in the main menu to always have them ready! How To: ‚Ä¢ Create your new adventuring party of up to 3 character ‚Ä¢ Dive in your selected zone with unique encounter & enemies ‚Ä¢ Encounter random events, fight enemies until you reach the boss of the stage ‚Ä¢ Shop more items before diving deeper into the next stage

Name: Persona 5 Royal
About the game: Prepare for the award-winning RPG experience in this definitive edition of Persona 5 Royal, featuring a treasure trove of downloadable content included! Forced to transfer to a high school in Tokyo, the protagonist has a strange dream. ‚ÄúYou truly are a prisoner of fate. In the near future, ruin awaits you.‚Äù With the goal of ‚Äúrehabilitation‚Äù looming overhead, he must save others from distorted desires by donning the mask of a Phantom Thief. Key Features: Explore Tokyo, unlock Personas, customize your own personal Thieves Den, experience alternate endings, and more Become the ultimate Phantom Thief and defy conventions, discover the power within, and fight for justice in the definitive version of Persona 5 Royal Includes over 40 items of previously released downloadable content Choose between Japanese and English VO

Name: Speedway Challenge 2022
About the game: Are you speedway fan? Were you ever thinking about speedway career? Would you like you lead your favourite team to the championship? Or maybe you would like to compete with your friends in a tournament? If you answered 'yes' at least once, Speedway Challenge 2022 is for you! Thanks to new riding model and animation you will feel like a real speedway rider. Show off your reflex at the start, choose the best lines at the track and rush for the glory in one out of 5 game modes: - MULTIPLAYER - get togheter with friends and ride in online tournament, - CAREER - get a license, fight for a spot in the team lineup, earn money, upgrade your gear and become a speedway legend, - LEAGUE - select your favourite team, choose your line-up, buy new riders and compete in Country Championship, - CHALLENGES - accept the challenge, play the competition and accomplish stated goals, - QUICK GAME - relax in a friendly match between 2 teams. Muliplayer mode's key features: - cross-platform - compete with friends no matter which device do you play - phone or PC, - opponents selection - invite your friends to the game or compete with random players, - many rider and bike skins to wear, - spot for spectator - any problem with decision who should be excluded from the re-run? invite fifth person, who will be a spectator, Career mode's key features: - creating your own rider, - license exam - pass it to sign your first contract, - many rider and bike skins to wear, - rider's equipment - complete and upgrade yours, - bike parts - invest in your bike to gain advantage over rivals, - transport - take care of logistics and upgrade your transport to take more parts for matches, - contracts - hire managers, to receive new contract offers, - rider's budget - grow your income step by step, but never spend all of your funds if you don't want to finish your career too quickly, - riding in a few leagues - choose the best offers and start in many leagues at one time (senior leagues available - Polish, Swedish, British, Danish, German, Czech, French and junior leagues - Polish, Swedish, British), - individual championships - become a junior or senior country champion, - individual world championships - qualify to the championship and fight for a speedway world champion title, - injuries - different types of injuries with variable recovery time, - complex statistics - monitor your results in comparison to the other riders, - varaiable riders performance during the season. League mode's key features: - team line-up - select your team's line-up for senior and junior competitions and lead them to victory, - club's budget - control your finances or you will be relegated to the lowest division, - transfers - negotiate contracts with your current riders and the ones you want to buy, - rider's morale - take care of mood among your team, - injuries - different types of injuries with variable recovery time, - complex statistics - monitor your results in comparison to the other teams, - varaiable riders performance during the season. Game's key features: - realistic riding model, including contact between riders, - real eWinner 1. Liga and 2. Liga ≈ªu≈ºlowa player and team names, - extended starting procedure, - configurable camera view (horizontal, from behind, first person and vertical, zoom in and zoom out) - referee decisions, - 3 difficulty levels, - game rules based on real leagues rules, - changing weather conditions, - over 90 teams (league and national), - almost 1000 riders with diversified skills, - over 40 tracks with different riding characteristics.

Name: Jack
About the game: Find all the pieces of candy to save your village from the entity called 'Jack'. But beware, Jack's friends seek to release him by stopping you. Features: 1. Gameplay where you have to collect candy before time runs out. 2. Visibility is limited by lighting around the map. 3. The horror is set around being pursued and being pressured by limited time. 4. Original scores of music. 5. Original audio sounds. Gameplay: Set in a village who contains the entity known as 'Jack', you must find all pieces of candy before time runs out and present each piece to Jack. All candy pieces are revealed one at a time and are at a random locations in the map. While finding the candy, the task of retrieving them will be increase in difficulty as the friends of Jack appear.

Name: Âª∫Á≠ëÂêßÂÖ¨Âè∏
About the game: 'Construction Bar Company' is a game that simulates running a construction company. The producer independently completed the production and design of this game, and before making this game, he was an architect. The game is both serious and witty, and the serious gameplay design is matched with witty expressions. The game art uses 'blue and white' to create a 'blueprint' temperament; plus red 'notes' and 'imprints', the overall project is full of flavor. Although the game looks 'simple', it is very rich in content. You can simulate all aspects of opening a construction company, such as taking orders, arranging work, team building with employees, PUA your employees, etc.; unlike most simulation business games, This work has a lot of writing on the employment, development and scheduling of staff. -The process of the game is more realistic: you must first accept the project, and at the same time hire the designer, and then let the designer complete the project as soon as possible within the limited period, and finally get the benefits... But in the simple process, the player will Experienced: [project selection], [project bidding], [resume screening], [Party A Yingzhou], [recovery of design fees], [payment of wages] and a series of troubles. One of the most troublesome is the scheduling of manpower. -Manpower is the highlight of the game: when the project is tense, employees should be arranged to work overtime, and overtime will accumulate more wages; if the employees are physically exhausted due to frequent overtime, they will need to arrange a [vacation], which will reduce productivity; potential employees should Only through training and learning can their grades grow faster; employees have different [grades], [occupational orientation], and [good content], all of which bring many different possibilities to work arrangements; in addition, some employees have [qualifications] Certificate], some employees have [Party A background], whether it is [loyalty] or [cohesion], there are too many interesting points in human resources waiting for players to discover. -[Party A] in the game needs public relations; the [technical paper] in the game is an important prop; the most cruel thing is when the salary is paid at the end of each month...hey...it's not easy to be a leader, if you want to achieve To maximize the operating efficiency, it really needs to strategize. (It's a big deal to be in arrears with wages -_-). -In addition, our game is still evolving, you will experience it one after another (the following is the direction of development content in the past 2-3 months): 1. The influence of employees' family attributes, personality attributes, work irritability, etc. on taking leave and resigning; 2. Fund transfers between players (brothers lent me 500,000 turnover, no money to pay wages!); 3. Participate in the game ranking list (Architectural Design Forbes_Let companies know their height); 4. Players dig employees from each other (management is also a kind of rivers and lakes, and all the bamboo shoots on the mountain have been taken away); 5. Players leave messages to each other; 6. Hidden god-level staff appear; 7. Project outsourcing and cooperation; 8. The endless level of conscience. 9. Modifications of small systems: (consumption of love to stimulate creativity, staff drinking and entertainment, appointment of studio director, etc.); 10. Make every effort to beautify the UI and make the vision more enjoyable (hehe); There are many more. . . . . All in all, thank you for playing our game! We will continue to update the content, if you have good ideas, you are welcome to contact us in various ways!

Name: Obedient Servant
About the game: Servant of the king or hero of the Mediterranean kingdom? What happens if an ordinary servant who cannot hold a sword decides to be promoted to the knights or even the royal guard? Defeat awaits you, or you will endure all the hardships of service and songs and legends will be composed about you! The game is a 2D platformer with RPG elements. Hunt monsters, complete various tasks and level up in positions by rank. Transform from an ordinary servant to an experienced hunter or a knight in the court of the king! You have a huge advantage, you are not expected to be a great success, so if you fail in this or that business, you have every chance of success again! All in your hands!

Name: Yandere Goddess: A Snatch Made in Heaven
About the game: Desperate to lose his virginity, Shinya resorts to the occult to summon a demon, a succubus ‚Ä¶anything with a pussy to finally pop his cherry! The results were unexpected because the ritual he looked up online actually worked and not only did he summon Alsiel, a high-ranking demon, but Neito, the Goddess of Love, popped out right behind her! This is destiny at work, right? Shinya and Neito are reunited and they'll be so madly in love, have babies, get married, AND NO OTHER WOMAN WILL EVER TOUCH HIM WITH THEIR FILTHY HANDS AGAIN!!! Forget about a demon's promise when you have a devoted goddess straight out of hentai heaven! Honestly, why settle for anything less than a ‚ÄúSnatch made in Heaven!‚Äù -Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel -Neito and Alsiel are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue -Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants -Hours of story content -Audio including music and special effects -Enhanced with character sprite animations -Gallery and Scene selections -Scene Studio with a customizable prompt to create a custom scene with in-game assets -14 scenes utterly devoting yourself to a beautiful goddess! Yandere Goddess: A Snatch Made in Heaven Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Norn. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan. ** PLEASE NOTE ** All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

Name: KUR
About the game: Everything was fine on the Mars colony until the robot spiders started murdering people and wearing their flesh. Now you‚Äôve got to wade into the carnage and and save the day again, or you‚Äôll probably get a bad rating on your freelance murder-for-hire profile. Destroy drones, ravage robots and stomp some skull-bearing spiderdroids in a dark-humor drenched take on the classic 90‚Äôs shooter. Good news though, you‚Äôve got some entirely untested and incredibly dangerous technology at your disposal to get the job done. How about a Strength Augmented Boot that can kick clean through the torso of a murderous fleshbot? Yep. That‚Äôs not all! The Boot jumps, The Boot slides, and The Boot sends your enemies flying through the air like a dive bar bouncer who‚Äôs had quite enough. If the idea of kick-murdering a horde of epidermis-adorned crome chuds doesn‚Äôt get the ol‚Äô blood pumping, first go see a doctor, and then let‚Äôs talk guns. We‚Äôve got them, there‚Äôs a ton of them, and they absolutely go boom. Too good for merely eviscerating your foes? Feel free to hit them with the shrink ray and laugh maniacally as their tiny form sails through the air compliments of your fancy footwork. Don‚Äôt let the classic graphics fool you, under the hood KUR is a full-featured shooter with additions to not only appeal to the nostalgic, but the discerning modern FPS fan as well. You‚Äôll get waist-deep in the lo-fi blood‚Äôn‚Äôguts as you blaze a path of destruction across over 20 hand-crafted levels. To keep you company, the driving soundtrack will help the frenzied pace keep rollin‚Äô as you dismantle the horde of murderous metal that stands between you and payday. Features - The Boot - kick, punt, and smash your way through waves of robotic evil. - Over 20 levels jam-packed with secrets and 90‚Äôs era humor across six unique environments. - Unnecessarily rad arsenal filled with gatling lasers, shrink rays, unexplainable double-legged kicks‚Ä¶ and of course‚Ä¶ there‚Äôs a shotgun. - Fully voiced characters - get ordered around by a slimy corporate stooge so realistic you‚Äôll swear you‚Äôre at your day job. - Demonic robots that wear human flesh with a heart of gold (probably)! - Bumping metal and electronica soundtrack, perfect for hunting rogue AI.

Name: Codemakers!
About the game: Codemakers! is a FPS roguelike about trying to rebuild the universe with fragments of code. as you slash, shoot, and strategize through machines and being of pure corruption, you must find out the reason in it all, and what happened here in the first place. at the end, will you save them at all? will you ready when the real threat emerges? each run is ended by encountering a Big Boss, these are the only enemy type in the simulator who are really alive. they also change how you play, turning the game into things like, a beat game, a top down survival, a turn based melee fight, and much more! after the battle is over, you get a choice. either save them, and bring them home, or sacrifice their soul for multitudes more fragments of code. who knows, maybe saving them will hurt, or it could prevent your demise.. they may also give you excursion quests, which may unlock some things you wouldn't get otherwise Wanna take a break from the standard game? try out some excursion events, some of which take you to a location to protect, some take you somewhere to eliminate, and some take you to recover data, all a fun style of gameplay to change up the loop. there will also be quest excursions, semi self contained side quests that take you inside your current universe to protect or rebuild, or to discover something new... As you play, you will have access to a wide variety of weapons to slash, blast, and evaporate your enemies. The guns you get in the run have a variety of fire types and an upgradable amount of modifiers, things that can change the raw code of the gun, making a sniper do 2x damage and shoot rockets, or making a single shot grenade launcher shoot a laser shot that reloads almost automatically. it adds a lot of variety to the gameplay. while your at it, you will also have access to melee weapons for your off hand, after all, who needs 2 hands for a plasma axe or 2 hands for a rail gun? not you! you can use your [V] to activate your melee, be it a smashing, slashing, throwing, or expanding type! you also have access to passive chips that you add to your own code, these range from giving you a 20% faster fire rate, to making you do 4x damage base on everything. you also have one active item slot. these are more mischievous to you, they can hurt, they can help. they can also just make a reference to a band that hasn't made an album in years, you don't know! you may even be lucky enough to drop an explosible truck or slow time, its a very large variety. we hope that with this massive variety in deadly choices, you can have your own fun! or just break the game and max out a minigun that crashes the game, up to you! some more features include an expanding-with-the-story overworld, new areas, new shops, new people, and new quests will show up as you unlock things, and discover the mysterious, aptly named Mysterium Corp. who helps, for now... there is also an upcoming room designer, witch you can use to submit levels for our review, and who knows, they might become official! there will also be overworld side quests, that might not take you to custom areas, like the upcoming keeper of the shells quests, which will have you do different things with shotguns to unlock new ones, and it all ends with the shotgun to kill gods.

Name: Talent Club ~ Match 3 Puzzle
About the game: 'Talent Club ~ Match 3 Puzzle' is a puzzle-type bead-rolling game developed by Ex-Erotia and published by BokiBoki Games. Players need to defeat each club's minister in a match-3 game in a social university club. Basic gameplay If the player completes the elimination and the opponent fails to eliminate it, they will be attacked. Eliminate 5 fragments at the same time, then it will automatically generate fragments of the color of our party or the opponent. Shards of different colors have different functions, which can restore HP or launch additional attacks. Using skills can also cause damage to the opponent. Game Features Turn-based elimination game Special props and skills Have full voice

Name: Êó∂Èó¥ÂàáÁâáÔºöÂ∫èÁ´†
About the game: Witches protect the order of the world in their floating castle, and it has been like this since the creation of the world. However, our little witch, Loretta travels through time, bringing an oracle that disturbs the witches and forces her to embark on a fateful adventure (again). Will she succeed this time? This is the story of the first-ever witch of time and her friends. Gameplay Pages of Time: Prologue is a 2D platformer puzzle game. Playing as the lovely witch Loretta, in the Magic Academy, use skills such as moving, jumping, recording and rewinding time, and launching magic orbs to solve various puzzles. Visual Experience Pages of Time: Prologue has elaborately drawn scenes and character art performance. When the protagonist activates time magic, the visual performance of the scene will undergo surprising changes. Check it out in the beautiful and spectacular Magic Academy. Story Content Experience the rich story presented in AVG and other forms, and feel the friendship of the witches. Each character has beautiful portraits. Game Process In the game process of about 60~90 minutes, accompanied by wonderful music, you will visit the game scenes with different atmospheres and challenge 13 ingeniously conceived puzzle levels.

Name: Lost Island
About the game: Story You are trapped at Island. Your mission is to survive and collect food and drink so not to die. Also beware enemies who try to kill you. Collect weapons like sword,pistols etc to fight against enemies. Also there are 2 Smith guys at Island. They have you 2 missions where they need help: 1. Finding missing item and 2. Saving kidnapped scientists. Also collecting 13 golden camp fires player get steam achievements. So be a hero and try to survive alone at this big Island Features: - Enemies with weapons - Golden campfires hidden. Collecting those gives steam achievements - Hungry/Thirst system. Collect food and drink to restore hungry/thirst - Different weapons like sword,knife,pistol etc - Lot of collectables like hats etc - Drivable car - 2 different missions: Find missing item and save captured scientists

Name: PUCK RUNNER
About the game: PUCK RUNNER is a challenging endless runner inspired by air hockey. Physically hit the puck to with your mouse to avoid obstacles, with your control of the puck being constantly threatened by ever-increasing speed and complexity. TACTILE GAMEPLAY Everything in-game from the puck, obstacles and even the mouse is a physics object with tactile, satisfying interactions and sounds. TIME MANIPULATION Puck Runner is simple to learn but tough to master, with a very high skill ceiling, Collecting energy allows you to slow down time to alllow you to regain control if you're in a tight spot, or speed up time to reach greater distances faster. STEAM LEADERBOARDS Compare your best distances and speeds with your friends and the community on Steam. Can you beat the rest?

Name: Unbearable
About the game: Claudia, a woman who has lost her job as a reporter, decides to go investigate the psychiatric hospital 'Milagros' which keeps a story as secret as it is macabre. During this journey he meets people who have the same intentions and others who will get in the way. With the help of her new companions, she must face the secrets of the psychiatric hospital, but the biggest fight is against her own mind. Narrative Story: Delve into a dark and gritty story with mechanics inspired by survival horror games from the ps2 era. Cooperative Campaign: Play the story alone or with a friend in split screen. Transversality: Climb through the scenarios to reach objectives and solve puzzles. Hide or Fight: Go unnoticed without alerting enemies or use the different melee and fire weapons to finish them off. Inventory System: Collect items, manage your resources and combine them to solve puzzles.

Name: Word x Word
About the game: Part crossword, part battleship, part game show. Word x Word pits two contestants against one another in a battle of word-hunting wits! Whoever earns the most points across three rounds wins the game. Search your board for blank letter tiles, vowels, points, and other goodies. When you think you've revealed enough blank tiles to form a few words, start spinning to pick letters, and rack up points! Both players are racing to find the word (or short phrase) that's the common link between all the words on their boards. Your boards contain the same words, so don't forget to watch your opponent for even more clues! The first player to guess the word wins the round! Word x Word contains hundreds of puzzles, with variations to keep you thinking for thousands of games!

Name: Pandas Bridge
About the game: Pandas Bridge is a 2D open world adventure game where you play as a Panda to solve the mystery of what has been going on inside the woods. As you venture further eventually the mystery is unravelled as you tread further to find out what's been going on. Run, Jump, Swim through this action packed adventure with rich graphics and interesting characters. explore each new level in this puzzle solving point and click adventure.

Name: War Dots
About the game: War Dots is simple-graphics, simple-gameplay, tough-difficulty strategy game. Recruit soldiers onto the battlefield and let them fight for your glory. Be careful though, once recruited, they are on their own. Evaluate battlefield situation fast, time your actions precisely and lead your army to victory. Straight into action No complicated tutorials, basics are easy to understand, new mechanics are added continuously as the game goes on. Missions range from 1 minute battles to 10+ minute wars. 50 handcrafted levels without random generation make sure the difficulty is tweaked just right (hard but still beatable). Bad luck? No problem. The game's designed around losing and retrying, rage-games style. One button restarts level instantly, without annoying loading screens. Keep on trying, keep on improving, to eventually become the best dot commander! Deceptively simple Some units are great on their own, while some will require assistance to achieve anything of value. Try out different combinations and find new counters to anything enemy can throw at you.

Name: Anatomy of Fear
About the game: A group of scientists travel to the place where the project started to unravel the mystery and results of the Bellatrix project. But a place called Bellatrix has not existed since work stopped. Your task is to reactivate and destroy the interconnected signals to bring Bellatrix to light, and all the while to stay alive! SINGLE PLAYER It is not recommended to play this mode if you are not experienced. Because the size of the map and the difficulties you will encounter can affect your mental health. MULTIPLAYER This game mode can be played between a minimum of 2 and a maximum of 4 people. You can create a lobby, press shift+tab and invite your online friends. If you have the same internet access point as your friends, after one of you has set up the lobby, the person who wants to join will only need to press the lobby button. If you're having trouble creating a lobby, exit and re-enter the game with all your teammates. You can increase your chances of survival by cooperating with other players, continue the story together and bring about the sad end of the company! CONTINUITY Every time you restart Anatomy Of Fear, there will be limited possibilities waiting for you, so you can reconcile with your teammates and have more fun.

Name: Fears to Fathom - Norwood Hitchhike
About the game: Fears to Fathom is an episodic psychological horror game where each episode unveils a short story narrated by the ones who survived. You're browsing the second installment of the Fears to Fathom anthology. Fears to Fathom : Norwood Hitchhike In the second episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Holly Gardner, a 19 year old who was driving back home from a gaming convention, as the traffic got horrible she decided to take the long way to avoid the traffic which leads to an unplanned trip to a motel. Little did she know what was going down in the Norwood Valley. She survived as she made the right choices . Key Features Atmospheric environment and photo-realistic graphics. VHS film aesthetic. Receive texts from NPCs. Player voice activity.

Name: Invasion: Neo Earth
